We slapped an 'M' for mature on the cover on purpose. If you're a young kid who stoled your parents credit card and are looking for comics on Kickstarter, don't buy this one (unless you're 100% sure you aren't gonna get caught)[DELIVERY TIMELINE] Chapter #2 is 100% complete and queued up at our printer. Printing will begin as soon as the KS ends (when we know exact numbers to order), with plans to have copies ready in < 1 month from the end date of the KS. Digital copies will get distributed to you right after the funding period as well. Obviously, it's a pandemic right now and there's wildcards, but that's our (optimistic!) timeline.[SHIPPING]Domestic shipping & handling is $3 per issue (which covers shipping, handling, and packaging). This cost will not change even as physical stretch goals are added to the project, as all items will be small enough to add in the mailer envelope with the book. For non USA locations, shipping is a standard $11. Unfortunately that is the cheapest shipping I can find, even with merchant discount USPS international rates, so for international backers digital pledges might be a better option. International backers will also be responsible for any duties/customs your country imposes - the customs form will declare the comic with a $3 USD value.[FUNDING GOALS AND COSTS]Most people don't know how much it really costs to produce a comic, and I wanted to be very transparent about the process, so you know how we priced our rewards and why we set the funding goals we did. In the case of The Ignis Quadrant, it costs $150/pg for the sequential art (which covers paying the artists for pencils, inks, colors,  then lettering). Then you add in more expensive pages (like covers, supplemental art pages, intro pages, etc) and the cost of editing. Chapter #2 cost us around $3700 total to produce.. THEN you have to factor in printing costs (~$2.50/piece), shipping ($2.80/piece domestic via media mail + packaging & handling), marketing/advertising, taxes and Kickstarter fees.  Any in our case, we offer the prequel issue for free, which we aren't even including in these calculations. Any comic creator will tell you that you don't get into comics to make money, but rather for love of creating and seeing your stories come to life.  It was very important to me to pay the artists up front for their amazing work, and take any risk for the project success onto myself. Our funding goal is barely a break-even point for the production and distribution costs of the comic, however I wanted to keep it affordable for backers, and am confident that you will enjoy our story and want to follow along for further issues as the story arc continues!  [EVAN CAROTHERS] - Writer, designer, and owner of EC3D DesignsI live in St Paul, MN and have been working in the gaming and world-building industry for many years, successfully creating and Kickstarting digital designs for characters, scenery and more to use in conjunction with your imagination (and 3D printers).  I have been developing the world of the Ignis Quadrant through multiple kickstarters and am excited to be working with such a talented team of artists and creatives to bring these projects to life! I am a black belt in Brazillian Jiu Jitsu as well, and plan to draw upon my martial arts experience to make some awesome hand to hand fight sequences in the comic.[JEZREEL ROJALES] - ArtistJez lives with his wife and children in the Philippines, where he works his magic to bring stories to life in beautiful imagery. Jez previously worked on Liberty:Deception, a sci fi dystopian comic. He also works as a storyboard artist for TV and commercials, as well as traditional water colors and Indie animation films.[MARIAM YASSER] - ColoristMariam is a skilled colorist residing in Cairo, Egypt. I met her on the awesome reddit community /r/ComicBookCollabs and was captivated by her bold,  bright design aesthetics and attention to detail. Her stylistic coloring brings the world of the Ignis Quadrant to life and makes it feel fun and exciting while simultaneously dark and dangerous.[JUSTIN "LETTERSQUIDS"] - LettersJustin has been lettering comics and doing logo/graphic design for many years with an impressively long portfolio. He's another awesome creator I met via Reddit. I was drawn to the sharpness of clarity in his work, and the unique way he blends multiple styles together so seamlessly. His work in our book is outstanding, and makes for one hell of a smooth reading experience[BOB SALLEY] - EditorBob has often been referred to as the hardest working guy in indie comics.  Bob has written and created so many comics that you could spend a few months reading only his awesome work and never get sick of it (Broken Gargoyles, Salvagers, Shelter Division, Ogre & Ogres w/Source Point Press). He helped me turn The Ignis Quadrant from an "ok" project into something I am crazy proud of.[OTHER AWESOME COLLABORATORS]Kurt Michael Russel (standard cover colors),  Mirko Di Noya (limited cover art),  Claudia Cangini (chapter intro pages), Joshua Black (character design), and  Jean Roux (supplemental art)  Full Page ExamplesCheck out some complete pages from Chapter #2, plus a few select pages from #0 & #1. And of course, you can see all the completed pages from the free prequel HERE. You can click any of the images to see them in high res![CHAPTER #2, PG 9][CHAPTER #2, PG 1][CHAPTER #1, PG 12][CHAPTER #0, PG 15]

story:
The exclusive Vampirella promo trading card featuring Anna's sketch design is included signed with every order!

ANNA, AKA "THAT STAR WARS GIRL" MAKES HER MARK ON COMICS WITH HER VERY FIRST COVER FOR DYNAMITE'S RECORD-BREAKING SERIES

Anna loves VAMPIRELLA and she's sharing that love with her fans by offering several editions of your choosing...

Anna, aka "THAT STAR WARS GIRL" is a concept artist from California. She grew up loving the STAR WARS Universe and everything from the original trilogy to the clone wars. The mythos built by George Lucas were the perfect foundation to build on. After seeing The Last Jedi in December 2017, she made a video reviewing how the film betrayed EVERYTHING that made STAR WARS special/what it stood for. That video started a chain reaction and, long story short, she became one of the founding members of a group called: The Fandom Menace. TFM’s goals are to (like a Jedi) use their powers and knowledge of STAR WARS to defend if from the complete and continuous butchery that's been done to it. Along with being a co-founder of TFM, she is also one of the co-hosts of the very popular J.A.C.K Show with her friends Jon Malin, Cecil, Kelsey Shannon and occasionally the celebrity guest Ethan Van Sciver.

DEDICATED TO ANNA'S SISTER

The rose in Vampirella's hand symbolizes Anna's sister. "This cover was inspired by and dedicated to my little sister Ellen Rose who passed June 2019. May her beautiful soul and memory never fade." - Anna, aka "That Star Wars Girl"

Vampirella is celebrating her 50th anniversary and "That Star Wars Girl" is excited to partner with Dynamite to produce this limited-edition cover!

Whether you're already a Vampirella fan, or curious where to start, Vampirella #1 is the beginning of her modern story and there's a good reason why it has sold over 150,000 copies to date...

VAMPIRELLA #1 is WRITTEN by Christopher Priest with INTERIOR ART by Ergun Gunduz​

"Unexpectedly dark and trippy ride that's worth checking out for fans and newcomers alike." - Adventures in Poor Taste

"This is everything I could have hoped for... Highest possible recommendation." - SciFi Pulse

"The book comes together seamlessly, making it a strong start for a new ongoing series starring a character that has seen decades of stories." - ComicsBeat

"Gündüz is such a brilliant artist, carefully crafting each scene to deliver the most intensity and emotion." - Horror DNA

COVERS ARE AVAILABLE SIGNED AND ALSO "REMARKED" WITH AN ORIGINAL SKETCH DONE BY ANNA!

COMIC CREATORS NEED YOUR HELP

The COVID-19 pandemic has affected the entire world in a variety of ways and the comics industry is a market that's suffering greatly right now. With comic shops forced to close their doors for safety, and their main source of distribution on hiatus, publishers and creators are feeling the strain. The passion of comic readers has always been a driving force for the comics business, but direct, online support from fans is now essential to the current state of the business, right now. If the comic industry is going to survive this pandemic, the fans will be the ones keeping creators and publishers in business!

The book is finished and ready for press, we just need to know how many copies to print. If we encounter any delays with fulfillment, they would likely be due to printer closings/delays due to the COVID-19 pandemic. We have set our fulfillment time as August in order to allow extra time for last-minute delays with printers, but we hope to be filling these orders sooner.

story:
Set in a near future where monsters appeared suddenly and without warning, bringing death and destruction. Ramon Alejandro Estévez-Guerrero roams the earth fighting these monsters in memory of his late wife and to make a better world for his daughter – he is the MONSTER MATADOR!

First, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to check out this project and considering helping to fund it. Given all that's going on in the world today, all of us on the team appreciate it.

I’ve always been drawn to the iconography of the Matador. One day I began to sketch out a character. A Matador. But I knew there needed to be more to it and suddenly it came to me in a flash. He would fight monsters… a Monster Matador.

Of course it needed something more. Fighting to save the world from monsters is great, but I wanted something more intimate and relatable. And that's where the idea for him to fight the monsters to make a better future for his daughter. I wasn't a parent when I started the book, but I am now and it's added a whole new layer to the storytelling. And with the current pandemic it couldn't hit closer to home. Whether you're a parent or not, our world is filled with "monsters" of all kinds - some so seemingly large that they feel unconquerable. Writing these adventures of a man with nothing more than a sword, cape, and the courage to face them has given me hope that these monsters, no matter what form they come in, are conquerable. I hope they'll make you feel the same.

MONSTER MATADOR: TANGO OF THE MATADORS #1 (of 3) is an action-packed thrill ride set in Puerto Barrios, Guatemala. The monstrous VOLAGANTE and her children have terrorized the people of this colorful seaport for years. Now the Monster Matador has taken up the challenge of defeating them. Fighting alongside a rag-tag group of locals and joined by a familiar face from his past, will their combined forces be enough to end the TERROR OF THE VOLAGANTE?! The main story is 26 pages and the book will also include additional pin-ups and art.

 In 2015 I digitally published my first early versions of Monster Matador. Now, with your help, I can finally produce the printed comic for the first issue of this new mini-series. This is the perfect starting point for new readers. TANGO, is the next phase of the story, but acts as a beginning. This is the story I always wanted to tell. And, to be honest, how I’ve always wanted it to look. Fabio Alves and Alex Zief are my creative dream team. You can see why in the preview below... 

 

STEVEN PRINCE used to work in the toy industry where he  managed and developed toy lines and animation projects for Puppy in My Pocket, Stink Blasters, and Power Buggz. He is the writer and occasional artist of MONSTER MATADOR, INTERGALACDICK, and unemployANT. He lives in Los Angeles.

FABIO ALVES is an independent comic artist based in Brazil. His most recent project was the critically acclaimed Action Lab: Danger Zone series, BANJAX.

ALEX ZIEF is a colorist based in Mexico City. She has colored for American Mythology Press, as well as comics including MS. VALKYRIE and RAMAS.

KATRINIA ROETS is our proofreader. She is also the author of children's stories and young adult fiction.

--

The book is 100% complete, our printer is still operating as an essential business,

All funds from this campaign will go to:

Printing rewards

Shipping them to you

Anything above our goal goes towards making more comics

Risks and challenges

While any project comes with some risk, given the challenging times we are living through we're doing everything we can to minimize it. The book is 100% finished and ready to go to print. With your backing, we are confident we can make Monster Matador: Tango of the Matadors a reality.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

“Birne, Schädel & Haupt” - das ist der Name der ersten deutschsprachigen animierten Webserie und gleichzeitig auch der Name der Köpfe unseres Protagonisten, dem dreiköpfigen Adler, der in den Bergen ein Animationsstudio betreibt. Dabei probiert er jedes Mal einen Animationsfilm zu produzieren und scheitert immer aus den verschiedensten Gründen daran. Welche Gründe das sind, könnt ihr unter anderem in unseren Beispielfolgen hier sehen.

 

Wir wollen, dass die Versuche des Adlers weiter in Serie gehen können. Und zwar ein Mal pro Monat. Und deshalb brauchen wir Eure Hilfe!

Derzeit haben wir vier Beispielfolgen vollkommen ohne Geld produziert. Damit daraus eine Staffel von insgesamt 12 Folgen wird, brauchen wir dringend noch eine Finanzierung in der Höhe von mindestens 20.000 EURO.
 

 



„Neuer Österreichischer Trickfilm“, das sind Benjamin Swiczinsky, Johannes Schiehsl und Conrad Tambour, ein Wiener Animationsstudio mit dem Schwerpunkt auf narrativen Animationsfilmen und der Erschaffung tiefgründiger, authentischer, animierter Charaktere für Film & Fernsehen.

Wir wurden 2011  gegründet. Unsere drei an der Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg entstandenen Abschlussfilme „Der Besuch“, „Heldenkanzler“ und „366 Tage“ feierten unter großem Medieninteresse im Wiener Filmcasino Premiere, und wurden danach auf vielen nationalen und internationalen Festivals ausgezeichnet. Stilistisch vielfältig, erzählen sie von Figuren aus dem österreichischen Milieu, denen bekannte österreichische Schauspieler und Kabarettisten ihre Stimme liehen.

Wir gründeten in der Wiener Innenstadt ein Studio in dem schon mehrere unterhaltsame Werbeclips, visuelle Effekte und preisgekrönte Musikvideos entstanden. Eines der größten Projekte war bislang die Regiearbeit an der internationalen Ko-Produktion „Hexe Lilli“, sowie die Titelsequenz für den Tom Hanks/Tykwer - Film "A Hologram For The King".


Derzeit befinden sich gleich mehrere Projekte in Entwicklung und Vorbereitung, darunter vorallem abendfüllende, animierte Spielfilme und ambitionierte Serienprojekte die in europäischer Zusammenarbeit entstehen. Mehr Infos über uns und unsere neuesten Projekte findet ihr auf:

www.trickfilmer.at



An dieser Stelle kommt ihr ins Spiel, denn nur durch euch kann die erste Staffel von “Birne, Schädel & Haupt" produziert und zum Leben erweckt werden!

Neben unseren ersten vier Beispielfolgen, wollen wir es schaffen mit mindestens 12 Episoden eine erste ganze Staffel fertig zu stellen. Mit allen Spenden, die darüber hinaus gehen, sollen weitere Episoden hergestellt werden.


Als Dankeschön könnt ihr zwischen vielen exklusiven Goodies wählen!
Wir haben für euch unter anderem handsignierte Zeichnungen, DVD's - und für Animationsbegeisterte sogar die Gelegenheit, selbst in der Serie als Stimme oder gar Karikatur vorzukommen.

Der Betrag, den wir für die Produktion von "Birne, Schädel & Haupt" benötigen, fließt in Bezahlung von Animatoren, Zeichnern, Musikern und Sprechern.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Zahlen via PayPal:
Sucht euch einfach euren Perk aus und wählt die Option "Zahlen mit PayPal".

Zahlen via Kredit Karte:
Sucht euch einfach euren Perk aus und wählt die Option "Zahlen mit PayPal". Und verwendet auf der PayPal-Seite die Option "Zahlen mit Kreditkarte" aus.
 

Zahlen via Banküberweisung:
Ihr könnt das Projekt auch per Banküberweisung unterstützen und euren Wunschbetrag unter Angabe des Namens und der E-Mail-Adresse an uns überweisen:

Benjamin Swiczinsky
IBAN: AT65 1952 0018 0008 8955
BIC: KRECAT2GXXX
Inst.: Bankhaus Krentschker

Bitte beim Zahlunsgrund auch angeben, ob ihr anonym oder unter eurem Namen spenden wollt. Am besten schreiben "anonym" oder "Name" vermerken.
 

 

Barzahlung:
Nähere Informationen dazu unter: kontakt@neuer-trickfilm.at

 

Vielen Dank für euer Interesse und dass ihr bis hier durchgehalten habt.
Bitte vergesst nicht uns auf Facebook und Youtube zu folgen, wenn ihr auf dem neuesten Stand bleiben wollt!
Wenn euch unser Projekt gefällt, sind wir euch super dankbar, wenn ihr es mit euren Freunden teilt: https://igg.me/at/BirneSchaedelHaupt


 

Eure Trickfilmer

story:
EYVA Comic Issue 1: Mainframe is Watching

EYVA is a cyberpunk comic series based on a love of 80s sci-fi and fantasy fiction. The story is based in the Ardent Nation, a stylised, technological utopia set in the 23rd century. However, all is not what it seems. Individuality and privacy are rare commodities that only the governing elite are privileged to.

Imagine, if you will, social media becoming the governing body of a surviving nation. Everything about you, what you do and what you say from the day you were born, is automatically streamed onto your timeline. This is then monitored by a authoritarian regime know as Mainframe.

Comic Specification:

Size: US Standard 6.69" x 10.24" (170mm x 260mm)

Number of Pages: 28 pages of story... A total of 32 pages incl. cover.

Printed on silk paper 170gsm/63lb (cover) and 130gsm/48lb (internal)

What is Mainframe?

Mainframe’s main directive is to compete for technological advancement and for survival in a post-apocalyptic world. In the spirit of fighting cyber and bio-terrorism, people of the Ardent Nation are kept on a short leash through the use of a surveillance implants fixed to the side of their heads. The message is simple: comply with Mainframe’s standard behaviour protocol or be rehabilitated… It’s basically all about working as a collective for a common cause, whilst suppressing any scope for individual thought or expression.

Who is EYVA?

Eyva Danell is very attached to her way of thinking and therefore, is pretty much a thorn in Mainframe’s side. She is a highly-strung bioengineer, who as we follow her journey of self-discovery, we learn of her past, living with the Reformists and her present agenda that could inadvertently lead to the ultimate betrayal.

Who are the Reformists?

The Reformists are a rebellion group in the eyes of the Ardents. Their ideology rejects invasive technology to protect the human spirit and embrace individuality. Ironically, they use an interdimensional portal to keep themselves tucked away from the clutches of Mainframe.

About the Comic:

Eyva started out as a television screenplay to explore conflict between differing ideologies. Due to my background in fashion, it became apparent that this story lent itself naturally to a comic series. After seeing Timothy Green II’s epic, illustrative work, I got into contact with him in the U.S. and we set off on a collaborative, cyber journey. The comic is now complete and ready for publication. It’s a labour of love and an extraordinary journey… One of which, we hope our readers will join us on.

With the support of our pledgees, EYVA Comic Issue 1: Mainframe is Watching will be the inaugural issue of what will be a provocative and thought provoking sci-fi comic series.

About the writer, ANNAS ESKANDER:

Annas Eskander is a writer with a passion for sci-fi and fantasy fiction. With a career stretching 15 years in fashion design, EYVA evolved from a TV pilot screenplay to a stylised, cyberpunk comic.

About the Illustrator - TIMOTHY GREEN II

Timothy Green II is an American comic book artist who has worked in the industry for 15 years with Marvel, DC Comics and Dark Horse. He is known for his work on such titles as Star-Lord, Aeon Flux, Red Hood and Rocket Racoon & Groot.

About the Videographer - THE FILM BOYS

The Film Boys come from creative backgrounds and have spent the last 20yrs plus telling stories for brands, companies and products through design, branding and marketing. The focus is now on film because there is currently no better way to tell stories or convey emotive messages than through the medium of video.

https://www.thefilmboys.co.uk

story:
Hello Bard fans!  Welcome to the funding campaign for Oi! BOOK 3: BANSHEE VALE CALLING!


THE STORY SO FAR

 

      Oi! Tales of Bardic Fury is a historical fantasy comic set in Iron Age Ireland that tells the story of Bryan the bard. Before graduating from the great Bardic College in Tara, Bryan must complete a one year work placement in a tiny coastal village in the north called Oi. When he arrives, he is shocked to learn the village never heard music before. After a rocky start in his first show, Bryan eventually finds his footing in town as a performer and befriends the mysterious and chaotic townspeople including the mushroom head town druid Star Seal.  Bryan even starts a band with Servius the Roman slave, Aideen the hurling captain and her little sister Rhiannon the selkie. As music and songs began to spread through Oi, the villagers became happier and more prosperous.
        In the story's first chapter, after accidentally summoning a pod of warrior orcas and leading a revolt against the oppressive tax collectors of Tara, Bryan became a legend in the village. Oi! SOLSTICE shows the victories of Oi – But warns that trouble is coming when Tara decides it is not going to let Oi escape their grasp any longer.
      Oi! BANSHEE VALE CALLING tells the story of a high-stakes hurling match between two rival villages that goes too far. Bryan the bard and Oi's hurling captain Aideen have to deal with Dana Bas and the New Way, Banshee Vale's animal sacrificing anarchic crew of  bards. With rations running low, Oi needs food to survive the winter, and the winner of the match gets a stockpile of dried food. Will Dana and Aideen's grudge match go too far? Meanwhile, the high druids of Tara begin clamping down around Oi. Will the power of Music and Bardic Fury be enough to save the day?

Oi! 3: BANSHEE VALE CALLING is the sequel to Oi! SOLSTICE.  The book will be printed with black and white manga-style interior pages and include 48 pages of story, with  bonus concept art and a fan art galleries in the back. Art, story, lettering and book design by me, Daniel de Sosa.

 


You can catch up with the story of Oi! so far on webtoons.

Check out this preview of BANSHEE VALE CALLING

 


New linework updated 3/24/2020




CONCEPT ART

 

 

PERKS


DANA BAS Pin-up print



WATER COLOR SKETCH CARD

A one of a kind water color painted sketch card. DM me on Indiegogo or email me at dnl.desosa@gmail.com if you have any requests.

 

Oi! Books 1, 2 and 3

Oi! Volume 1 has 136 risograph printed pages and contains the first five chapters of Oi! Tales of Bardic Fury. SOLSTICE is 76 pages. You can own the entire collection of BARDIC FURY to date!

 

ORIGINAL ROCK STAR PORTRAIT

6"x 6" custom portrait of YOU, your friend or loved one as a ROCK STAR. Let me know if there are any specific rock stars or album covers you want your piece to be inspired by. You can also use this slot to commission portraits of your tabletop RPG character, your OC or your favorite pet. I am happy to draw anything, just ask.


ORIGINAL ART PAGE

You will receive ONE page of ORIGINAL INKED ART from the interiors of BANSHEE VALE CALLING or Oi! SOLSTICE selected at random. All pages are a unique work of art and beautifully inked with brush by hand.

 

STAR SEAL WATER COLOR PAINTING

12"x 14" watercolor painting of Star Seal, the cosmic town druid of Oi.

 

ORIGINAL COVER ART

The original 5.5"x8.5" inked cover art drawing for Oi! BANSHEE VALE CALLING

 

BECOME A PEASANT. YOU CAN BE A MEMBER OF Oi!


You, a friend or a loved one can become a permanent cast member and villager in the town of Oi! You will receive at least one speaking line in BANSHEE VALE CALLING and the next chapter of Oi! I will also send you an original hand drawn and inked portrait of yourself in Iron Age gear. OR can be a punker rocker Banshee Vale villager if you want!

You will be asked to a provide photo reference and are welcome to give suggestions for your comic avatar. This is your chance to be immortalized as a webcomic and printed character forever!

 

ORIGINAL CUSTOM 8 PAGE COMIC

I will work with you to create a custom 8 page full color comic of a story of your choosing. If you have a script written, I will illustrate it for you. If you have a story concept but no script, I can write stories based on your concepts. I will also ship the original art pages of your story to you. SHIPPING IS FREE FOR US-BASED PLEDGES.

 

 

ABOUT THE ARTIST

I am a cartoonist with 7 years of experience in drawing, creating and publishing independent comics. I have exhibited and sold my work at comic cons around the world including MCM Glasgow, MCM London, Thoughtbubble UK, Wondercon, San Diego Comic Fest, Fan X Salt Lake, Los Angeles Comic Con. and Las Vegas Comic Con. Having successfully crowdfunded four previous graphic novels Oi! TALES OF BARDIC FURY VOLUME 1, PURRVANA, A SONG OF MICE AND FUR, and Oi! SOLSTICE, I'm excited to start a campaign for Oi! SOLSTICE. I founded OMEOW COMICS with the goal of self-publishing entertaining comic stories that encourage people to think for themselves. I love creating high quality entertaining comic books for your enjoyment and with your help I can continue to keep doing so.

 

THANKS for following OMEOW COMICS. I am grateful for all support and social media shares. If you think BARDS ARE AWESOME, please consider supporting this project!

story:
In April-May of this year, eleven Australian comic creators; variously award-winning, locally-adored and internationally-published; are touring the North-Eastern United States and Toronto, Canada. This might well be the furthest a group of cartoonists has ever travelled to sell books, give lectures, panels and workshops and to promote Australian comics.

 

We’re calling it the Caravan of Comics.

 

On arrival we'll have one day to recover from jet-lag and then for three weeks we'll do a comic event or we are on the road driving to one everyday.

  • MoCCA! - Museum of Comic and Cartoon Art’s annual independent comics festival in New York
  • TCAF! Toronto Comic Arts Festival up in Canada
  • CCS! The Centre for Cartoon Studies in Vermont
  • More! Comic jams, appearances and signings in stores including: drawing with the artists behind the Kids Read Comics Festival in Ann Arbor; Little Island Comics in Toronto, Quimby’s Bookstore in Chicago; Comic Book Jones in New York City. More even, but we haven't quite nailed them down yet. 
 

On board the Caravan we have: Pat Grant, Ben Hutchings, Andrew Fulton, Mandy Ord, Douglas Holgate, Sarah Howell, David Blumenstein, Matt Taylor, Gregory Mackay, Michael Hawkins, Jen Breach & podcaster and comics roadie John Retallick.

 

The adventure is clear - promoting our work and our industry in a much more established part of the world - a part of the world very far away from where we are right now, and one frustratingly expensive to get to.

 

Our goal, $4000, will cover one Caravaner's flights and accommodation on this trip. We hope to do the Caravan again with more and different cartoonists in future years, and if we can prove we can get enough community support to turn a cartoonist into an international ambassador, we reckon we can prove our case and get some more "formal" funding next time around.

 

So we're hoping some of you out there can help us out a little. And we can help you out. With comics. You like comics, right? Of course you do. And we've got some good ones. Get yourself some original art, sign up for us to send you some drawn-all-over postcards, get some comics up in your guts.

 

Even if you don't want any of that nonsense, a couple bucks chucked our way will probably make you feel pretty good for a little bit, knowing that you're helping us not get eaten by mooses, or hamburger dragons, or whatever it is they have over there.

 

Right?

story:
FLASH!!!

Xigency Studios Inc. is a comic book publishing company based in Chicago, IL.  We have been in business for over 4 years and have multiple comic book titles which are currently in circulation. Amazonia est.2008, AWF - est March 2010, Primetime Saturday Night  Est. Aug 2010, and Enigma, coming soon... (Hurry up Kim people want to hear your story!!!)


THE FACTS!!!

In order for us to continue publishing, we need your help. We truly believe that the AWF comic book series has the potential to positively affect its future readers by providing unmatched entertainment. We want to maintain and build on the comic book series. We want to provide you with new talent, new themes, new ideas, a few body slams. With your help we will be able to provide much needed monetary funds for the current art staff, Kimberly Moseberry and Greg Horn, and  hire new staff for the upcoming series. We want to produce our comics on a bi-monthly basis, however without your support we will be lucky if we can produce one in a year. With your help we can continue this dream.


THE GOAL!!!

 With as little as a $1 donation, you can help us build this dream into the reality that it can be. The fact is without you, we can not exist, which is why you are so important to us. A Taoist proverb states that "The Journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step." Please help us continue to make this belief a reality. With your help we will raise 10000 dollars this month, and stabilize our future for your enjoyment.

Last but not least!!!

Please spread the word about our campaign. In order to do this copy and past the link above onto your wall, state the reason why you wanted to do it, and push the "like" button. Tell your family, friends, neighbors and co-workers  about our existence . Also, you can support us by purchasing issues of AWF from www.xigencystudios.com ). Try out a subscription, and check out all of our series. Look, seriously I know that was all an ear full, it isn't easy finding , this thankyou is from all of us here who tighten our belts in order to get you the comic book series we know you thanks for your time and attention to this campaign as we hope that you will help us bring you the best stories in comic books.

story:
The transcontinental railroad was going to bridge the East to the West and usher in a new age of prosperity along the frontier. But something's gone wrong. A crew of rail workers has disappeared, and settlements along the line are falling silent. The railroad hires Nathanial Holden and Ezekiel Grey to search for answers. What they find instead is a trail of bodies and a quiet town on the verge of annihilation.

"The dead will find no rest here..."

Frontier Graveyard: The Risen is the first graphic novel in a new horror\western series. The series’ formula is a cross between X-files and John Wayne, though this volume is more Night of the Living Dead meets Clint Eastwood meets Frankenstein. The Risen focuses on zombies terrorizing the frontier. In future stories we will expand the universe to include werewolves, vampires, and many other monsters, but first we need to get this book to press; that’s where you come in.


A story with a twist. As a former film student, our writer incorporates many classical western and zombie themes into this volume.  However, The Risen isn't just another zombies vs. cowboys story. The origins behind the outbreak have a hint of steam punk, and one of the main characters is a... samurai? Yep, that's right.



What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise money to help promote the book -- primarily, we would like to setup at conventions (which is inherently expensive, thus the need for the campaign).  We also hope to raise additional funds to help start the sequel and spin-off (already in the works).  For those interested in contributing:

  • Everyone who gives will get a thank you credit on our website and Facebook page.
  • We have the full graphic novel in both alternate and regular cover, and in print and digital.
  • For those wanting to sample the work but not commit to the price of a full graphic novel, we have limited run "issue #1's" (the first chapter printed as a single issue.
  • We're also offering a wide range of originally, including back cover sketches, original pages, and even the pencils for the book cover itself!


Risks & Challenges

There is very little risk.  All the incentives that we're listing have already been produced and are ready to be sent once the campaign has concluded.  We may need to produce some new material for stretch goals, but that's about it.

story:
Goal

It's nearing the 2 year anniversary of HJ-Story web-toon.  Thanks for everyone's continous support, There're many plans I have for HJ-Story and I've finally decided to push HJ-story to another level and create an iPhone app!

 

For those unfamiliar with HJ-Story, you can check it out at one of the follow site:

HJ-Story.com

HJ-Story Facebook

HJ-Story Deviantart

 

The goals of our iPhone app are:

Automatic updates and notification

Adding images to Favorite list

Iphone exclusive news and contents

Easy Sharing via facebook/twitter/instagram (and others?)

Easy to navigate and pretty interface :D

Other fun features to be announced! (Text edit of pictures,etc)

 

Please feel free to give suggestions!

Depending on the progress of the fundraising, we'll use any extra funds to update our goal and create more contents and even merchandises such as books, cards, tshirts,etc.

 

We're aiming between May/June for the App launch~!

 

 

 

Our Story

I was a boy...

 

 She was everything...

 

Before this blog was created, it all began with a bunch of little drawings I did and sent her via sms messages on the phone for fun.  I was never very good with expressing through spoken words.  Her birthday was coming up and I wanted to prepare a tiny surpirse for her, and gathered the drawings and created a blog for her.  That was the beginning of HJ-Story

 

It was meant to be a personal blog, and thanks to the massive support from everyone, it has grown to something a lot bigger then I've ever imagined to be.

         

 

What We Need & What You Get

For 2 years, HJ-Story has been maintained by nothing but love and passion.  Help us take it to the next level!  All the funding will go towards extra contents and development fee for the iPhone app.  Depending on how the fundraise goes, it opens the door to many different opportunies of HJ-Story.  I wish that we can all survive on love alone, but bills needs to be paid and though our programmer needs to go on a bit of diet but he needs food too :) 

 

We need all the support that you can give to make it happen.  Our programmer will be soon quitting his day job to focus on HJS app to make sure it finishes developement ASAP!

 

For the video tutorial and postcard perks, it'll be going into production soon and expected to be delivered around end of March/early April!

 

We'll try to update the perks as the fundraising continue, and if anyone has cool ideas please feel free to share in the comments!

 

Support us to deliver better content and more updates!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There're other ways you can help too!

 

1. Help us spread the news via facebook, twitter, email,etc

2. "Like" us on HJ-Story Facebook!

3. Follow us on HJ-Story Twitter

4. Send us ideas for campaign to hjstory@live.com

5. Just keep reading and enjoying HJ-Story and spread the love around! :)

Automatic updates and notification
Adding images to Favorite list
Iphone exclusive news and contents
Easy Sharing via facebook/twitter/instagram (and others?)
Easy to navigate and pretty interface :D
Other fun features to be announced! (Text edit of pictures,etc)
 
Please feel free to give suggestions!

story:
About Us

Hi my name is Claudiu. C  (27) I'm from Germany and I love comics. Me and my friend Marian. A (31) are very passionate about drawing comics and we finally found some time to put our idée on paper.

What is our project about

The project is called "El Mascarito" The Web Comic Series. If this campaign is successful then  we will create the Web Comic Vol.1

 

Story

One little Village in Spain "El NORO"is very rich in oil and because of this is constantly attacked by Bandits and creatures but be not afraid El Mascarito will save you and your Family.

The evil Mastermind Gonzalez and the pack of Bandits are trying to scare away the people of this beautiful Village to get the hands on the Oil and sell it for profit.

El Mascarito falls in love with Adriana, The Evil Bandit BOSS Gonzalez is very jealous because Adriana is in love with El Mascarito....:)

Amigos

If you Liked our Project then support us to create El Mascarito.

story:
Intro

Hi!

Here is Javier Ezarde, a young Spanish illustrator artist who needs destroying!!! Ehh.. I mean create!

I still remember me as a child spending the hours enjoying playing with my favourite toys: Plasticine, the sketch books and pencils!... In resume everything that allowed me to develop my imagination & creativity!Years have passed Till now and I still feel that my greatest passion and sense of life is creation.


Hola!

Soy Javier Ezarde, un joven artista e ilustrador Español que necesita destruir!!! Digo... Crear!

Aún recuerdo como desde bien pequeño me pasaba horas y horas entretenido con mis juguetes preferidos; la plastilina, los làpices  y los cuadernos... en definitiva cualquier cosa que me permitiese desarrollar mi imaginación y creatividad!

Los años han ido pasando hasta llegar a día de hoy, en que sigo sintiendo que mi mayor pasión y sentido de vida es "crear".




         

"Let comics come to me! (or viceverse)

Well, for that reason I want to launch my own comic!

As a good son of 80´s I grew up on a magic environment of cartoons, superheroes, toys.... All of that fed up my imagination and life as the perfect flame to enjoying and learning walking through a lot of amazing stories. (Ok, eventhough they were fiction we can also learn from them, couldn´t we?).

Today it´s me the one who want to entertain millions of people (young & adults)  coveying the feelings and thoughts I have when i am reading a comic.

I believe that comics are the best way to reach that. Comics are not just story-tellers... Comics have the power to show stories on the most intimate form. (As if you were the only one that could see them trhough a lock) so is easy feel they have their own soul. Perhaps it can sound very mystic, but if you love comics as I like them, I guess you could easy understand me. I could bet that if you have a comic furniture place on your house for sure you have also some collectionism figures, posters, films...

In fact, the Sver chronicles comic, is just a beginning! The top of an iceberg much more deeper that could emerge if you help me...

If you wanna know more, keep reading!

"Dejad que los cómics se acercen a mí!!!"

  (o viceversa)

Bueno, es por esto que deseo lanzar mi primer cómic!

Como buen hijo de los 80´s nací en un maravilloso entorno de dibujos animados, superhéroes, juguetes... que siempre alimentaron mi imaginación y mi vida como una chispa con la que poder aprender y entretenerme a través de increíbles historias (vale aunque sean ficticias también se puede aprender de ellas, no?)

Hoy yo también deseo poder entretener a miles de personas (jóvenes y adultos)  transmitiendo emociones y reflexiones como las que yo aprendo y vivo todavía cuando leo un cómic.

Creo que el cómic es el medio más adecuado para lograr esto. Los cómics no sólo nos cuentan historias...nos las muestran de una manera tan íntima (como si uno las estuviese viendo desde un hueco en la puerta) que es fácil sentirlas con alma propia. Puede que suene un poco místico, pero si te gustan los comics como aquí seguro que entenderás de lo que te estoy hablando... apostaría a que si tienes comics en tu biblioteca seguro que también tienes alguna miniatura de coleccionismo, pòsters, películas, etc...

De hecho, el cómic Sver Chronicles, es tan sólo un comienzo! La punta de un icieberg mucho más profundo que puede salir a la luz si me ayudas...

Si quieres saber más... sigue leyendo!





      

The beginning...

Even my first sketchings starts at the beguinning of this year. Sver Chronicles histoy actually was born little before... During the February of 2013 a young artist eager of work and a recent writer and editor of sci-fi books met and start sharing their creative passion for this genre.

Alejandro Aquilar show me his novel "The smaller of the litter" an amazing story full of fantastic adventures that makes my mind fly introducing me plenty of his editorial proyect: "EX-tint Editors". A pretty new digital editorial concept based on developing sci-fi novels and all the close world they are link: Roll &table games, posters, miniature figures....  All of that of course incluides me!
 

El comienzo...

Aunque empezase con los primeros esbozos del cómic a principios de este 2014, Sver Chronicles realmente nace un poco antes... Entorno a Febrero del 2013 un joven artista deseoso de trabajar y un reciente escritor y editor de libros de ciencia ficción se conocen compartiendo su pasión creativa por este género.

Alejandro Aguilar me presenta su novela "El menor de la camada" una auténtica obra de aventuras fantásticas que hace volar mi imaginación, enfrascándome de lleno en su proyecto editorial: "EX-tinta editores". Una innovadora editorial creada por varios socios centrada en el desarrollo de novelas de ciencia ficción y todo su mundo adyacente (cómics, juegos de mesa, miniaturas...etc..) Eso me incluía a mí!


 

Stand de EX-tinta editores.Expocomic 2013.

 

Algunos de los primeros bocetos y concepts de la novela "El menor de la camada"






My Project: "The Sver Chronicles"

Sver Chronicles is a sci-fi comic that follows the adventures of Arriha Sver, a young member of an interstellar hired race of soldiers (the Hedenits) who have been trained for many thousands of lives in the art of war. Within this universe, known as the "Old domain" there are many other races and unstructured societies with their own interests, cultures, powers and technologies that, alliances and war go together just to get control galaxy.

In short "SVER Chronicles" is a comic that will appeal to everyone who loves science fiction adventures full of action, amazing creatures and new conepts of reality. Different worlds, relationships, even new concepts of life are only small differences between readers and characters, which at the end have questions, concerns and feelings like we do in our day to day.

Mi Proyecto: The Sver Chronicles

Sver Chronicles es un cómic de ciencia ficción que narra las hisitorias de Arriha Sver, una joven perteneciente a una casta de soldados interestelares a sueldo (Los hedenitas) que han sido  entrenados durante miles de vidas en el arte de la guerra. Dentro de este Universo conocido como "El Viejo Dominio" existen otras muchas castas y no castas con sus propios intereses, culturas, poderes  y tecnologías en las que las alianzas y guerras corren en paralelo  a fin de controlar la galaxia...

En resumen "Sver Chronicles" es un cómic que gustará a todo aquel que le apasionen las historias de ciencia ficción. Esas que cambian nuestros conceptos de la realidad tal y como la conocemos, para poder entenderla desde otra perspectiva.

Los diferentes mundos, relaciones e incluso conceptos de vida son tan sólo una pequeña diferencia entre el lector y los personajes, que en definitiva, siguen teniendo inquietudes, dudas y sentimientos como nosotros al relacionarse con su entorno.






    

The Setback;

Even Though our enthusiasm and passion for this project and the work that requires, we live on a difficult moment to find one of the most important things needed to develop a project when it is beginning.... Could you guess what I am talking about? Yes.. the money.
Even Though the world situation we are passing through, our enthusiasm tell us we should never give up. We believe that when you know clearly what you want, and you love it, universe helps you (in this chase with your help!)


Las Dificultades;

A pesar de nuestra gran pasión por este trabajo y proyecto, vivimos en un momento en el que en muchos sitios es difícil encontrar una de las cosas que desgraciadamente más se necesitan para desarrollar un proyecto cuando está empezando.... ¿Adivinaís que puede ser?  Así es, el dinero....

Pero a pesar de la difícil situación nuestros ánimos no desistieron, ya que creemos que cuando uno tiene claro lo que quiere hacer, el universo le ayuda (en este caso a través de vosotros!)








    


What we need;

Rightnow I have written the 3 scripts of the 3 parts in wich the comic is divided. The publishing of the 2 next comics will depend on the succes of the first which I have the 60% drawn.

If you help me to reach the help I wonder, I guess at the end of the year I could have the first episode finish and publishing. The two next will be for the next year.

I need  funding for:

-The printing, binding of the first 1000 comics.

- The printing of the promotional material and merchandising

- Internet publicity

- Send the material of the rewards to the fundhelpers

- The maintenance of the autor the months he need to finish de comic.



Lo que necesito;

Ahora mismo llevo escritos los 3 guiones de los 3 episodios en los que se dividirá el cómic. La publiación de los 2 tomos siguientes dependerá del éxito del primero, del cual ya tengo tengo un 60% dibujado.

Si consigo alcanzar la financiación que espero, calculo que a finales de año pueda tener el primer tomo terminado y publicado. Los dos tomos siguientes se llevarían acabo en el siguiente año. 

Necesito financiación para:

- La impresión y encuadernación y envío de una primera tirada 1.000 cómics.

- La impresión de material promocional y merchandising; folletos, figuras, pegatinas, etc.

- Promoción y publicidad en internet y el porcentaje de los honorarios de crowdfounding

- Mantenimiento del autor el mes(es) que necesite para terminar el 50% restante del cómic.





Other Objetives!

- 10.000 $ I will launch the second chapter of Sver Cronichles and probably  the third.

- 15.000 $ I will launch the second and third chapter of Sver Cronichles and perhaps a concept book art with unpublished extra content of the Sver Cronicles story and other secrets of the "Old domain"...

- 20.000 $ I will launch the second, third chapters of "Sver Chronicles" and the concept book and perhaps a new comic of another character of the novel: " The "smaller of the litter"


Otros objetivos!

- 10.000 $  Lanzaré el segundo capítulo de Sver Cronichles y probablemente el tercero.

- 15.000 $ Lanzaré el segundo y tercer capítulo de Sver Cronichles y tal vez un libro del concepto artístico de los comics con conteido adicional inédito de la historia Sver Cronicles y otros secretos del Viejo Dominio ...

- 20.000 $ Lanzarè el segundo, tercer capítulo de "SVER Chronicles" y el libro del concepto artístico, además de tal vez un nuevo cómic de otro personaje de la novela: "El menor de la camada "





                 THANKS!


NOTHING ELSE! JUST HOPE MY PROJECT AND AWARDS LIKE YOU SO YOU CAN ENJOYING AS MUCH AS I CREATING THIS!

:) OF COURSE THANKS A LOT  FOR YOUR TIME AND HELP. IF YOU WANT TO KNOW SOMETHING MORE DON´T THINK IT TWICE, YOU CAN CONTACT ME AND I WILL TRY TO SLOVE  ALL THE QUESTIONS !




                 GRACIAS!

NADA MÁS, ESPERO QUE MI PROYECTO Y RECOMPENSAS TE GUSTEN TANTO COMO YO DISFRUTO AL HACER ESTO! SI TIENES CUALQUIER TIPO DE DUDA LO PIENSES DOS VECES Y CONTACTA CONMIGO.  INTENTARÉ RESOLVERLAS LO MEJOR QUE PUEDA!


MUCHAS GRACIAS!

story:
This project is now complete.

Thanks to everyone who donated.

To find out the story of creating this book click here.

To read the finished book click here.

story:
Grey Seal

TREVOR has it all - looks, brains, girls and all the toys a man would want.  He even has an exciting career as a Navy Seal.  Life couldn’t be better.  Then he wakes up.

Trevor is confined to a wheelchair, living on a war-vet pension in an apartment above a smelly Chinese produce store.  Trevor drinks to escape his real existence until he’s back asleep, dreaming fragments of his mission.

He dreams of his last covert operation – the heavily guarded mysterious sphere he had to retrieve from a castle in Hong Kong.  Except his Commanding Officer, COLONEL WAGNER, tells Trevor that he was never in Hong Kong.  In his records it says that insurgents in Kabul shot and wounded him.  But even though Trevor has little or no memory of the past six months, he knows and feels certain details about his last mission.  Including the presence of JACK, the Black Masked man who shot him – in Hong Kong.

Since his injury Trevor has shut himself off from the world.  He is angry and resentful. MING, a Chinese prostitute and Trevor’s neighbor, becomes his only friend and confidant.  Although he falls in love with her, Trevor resists Ming’s growing affection for him, fearing he has nothing to offer anymore. 

The Book

In each chapter Trevor’s pursuit is to remember his mission and how he was injured.  But most importantly he needs to find the sphere.  It holds the key to what’s happening to him.  The quest however leads him on a journey that offers more questions than answers, while proving to Trevor that he is on the right path. The mysterious TWELVE aids Trevor and Ming often in surprising ways.  To stay alive and one step ahead of Col. Wagner, Trevor must evade Jack.  And of course, in each chapter Trevor and Ming come close to taking their friendship further, but for various internal or external interferences they remain only friends.  Trevor needs to find the sphere, as it is the key to whatever is going on with, and around him.

About the Team

My name is Nastasha Baron and I'm the creator of Grey Seal. I have always been fascinated by alternate evolutionary theories and have read many books on the subject. I like the possibility that there is a more deliberate purpose to our existance.

Santiago Calle and Juan Calle are the key people behind the look and feel of Grey Seal. Luis Suarez, Diego Rojas, Rodolfo Leon and Andres Penagos comprise their small team of illustrators who are responsible for coloring the panels.

I would also like to thank John Sereda, John Kerti and David Diplock for helping me work through the story. Their input and patience was very valuable to the process.

How Your Money Helps Us

The book has five chapters of which two are complete. We are raising money to finish the remaining chapters of the book. Our team has worked on this project at nights, weekends and in between our 'day jobs'. The layout and most of the inks are finished. Your donation will fund the rest of the inks and all the color processes.

With each donation we will get one step closer to completion. We will finish this book, but with your help we can finish it sooner and make it better.

Other Ways You Can Help

Grey Seal was visualized as a Transmedia project. This book is just the beginning. You can help by getting out the word to as many people as you can about it. Kindly tweet, or post on Facebook or on your blogsite about it.
 
Thank you for your time and for your support.

story:
Chaotic Flux centers on a group of unique heroes, who unite in the future to rid the world of flesh-devouring mutant abominations, that come to be known as Dreadfiends, as humanity's last hope of survival. 

Chaotic Flux #2 is 28 pages long.

SHIPPING NOW!

Issue #2 picks up where issue #1 leaves off, focusing on how Zithara, an alien/human hybrid, who can form red crystal-like structures at will into weaponry, is thrust into a tense race against time to save a human family from becoming the flesh-devouring Dreadfiend's next meal. The Dreadfiend from issue #1 continues to give Zithara hell, constantly adapting and outsmarting her, she has to give it her all before time runs out.

Can Zithara, a gifted alien-human hybrid warrior, outdo the beast or is all hope lost?

You can get Chaotic Flux #1 as an add-on at checkout.

 

Chaotic Flux #1 is 26 pages long.

 

DOUBLE SPLASH PAGE

Go to SharpEdgeComics.com to see lots more on Chaotic Flux #1,

including more preview pages.

 

My name is Scott Payne. I have been a huge comic book fanatic for most of my life. I've wanted to be a comic book creator ever since I can remember, but I've always felt that if I'm going to do it, I'm going to do it BIG.

With that, I have been building on this story and world for 20 years. Chaotic Flux is a huge mega force, a grand culmination of ideas, story elements, and characters influenced by many things that I have loved throughout my life. Chaotic Flux is a passion of mine and that I want nothing more than to get it into the reader's hands.

Illustrator: Brian Balondo - Returning for Chaotic Flux #2, Brian is a very talented and versatile up and coming artist. It has been said many times that his art would fit wonderfully in the books of the big 2. Some of his other works include Star Burn, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and Chaotic Flux #1.

Colorist: Bryan Magnaye - Also returning for Chaotic Flux #2. Bryan is a genius when it comes to his coloring techniques. He makes that art just jump right off of the page every time. Some of Bryan's other works include The Mighty Titans, War of the Independents, Rising Sun, Undercity Tales, and the greatly successful IndieGoGo comic, RAVAGE - KILL ALL MEN!

Letterer: Janelle Murphy - Chaotic Flux #2 will be Janelle's first lettered comic. But as you can see from the previews above, she has a natural talent for it. Her drive and devotion to making this book turn out great as just as strong as anyone else on our team.

I am so lucky to have these amazing and talented artists to help me bring my great continued vision to life.

Metallic cover edition with rainbow color changing effect!

(Back as a VERY limit overstock re-release.)

 

These are the trading cards from the Chaotic Flux #2 campaign. They are no longer available, but expect cards #5 & 6 to be included in the Chaotic Flux #3 campaign.

 

Chaotic Flux #2 campaign t-shirt.

 

(T-shirt no longer available for purchase)

 

 

Chaotic Flux character sketch cards.

By Simon SIM Pothier

Introducing 3 original art sketch cards of Chaotic Flux characters!!! Now added to the Chaotic Flux #2 campaign!!! 

These are HAND DRAWN AND INKED ORIGINAL ART sketch card pieces, by the talented Simon SIM Pothier! ONLY ONE OF EACH was made. So these are SUPER RARE. They are going for $25 each, with NO SHIPPING COST!

Simon was so kind to do these sketch cards for the campaign to help it out. I think they turned out GREAT! 

Simon SIM Pothier is known for his Heavy Metal Magazine art style and his comic book, BLOODHUNT: Payback is a Bitch! Now INDEMAND on IndieGoGo. His book, Tales from the NATVERSE: Prelude, is also coming soon to IndieGoGo. 

Get these FANTASTIC original sketch cards while you can!

 

STRETCH GOALS

BOOKMARK STRETCH GOAL MET!

 

(STRETCH GOAL HAS ENDED)

 

(STRETCH GOAL HAS ENDED)

 

The 6 members of the Crimson Flame:

Sorin (team leader) - Pilot of the Reaper exosuit

Zithara - Alien human hybrid warrior

Strife - Transforming, self engineering A.I. mecha

Nellaria - Fire-based mage

Pagan - Plant-based mage

Garadith - 8' tall swordsman, with a giant transforming sword.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $4000.

This is mainly to cover the cost of paying the talented artists that made Chaotic Flux #2, which is more than half of what we are asking for. As the comic is halfway finished, the rest of the $4000 goes towards printing 1250 copies of the non-metallic version of the book as well as making all of these additional awesome rewards, and shipping them all out to you.

You get a fantastic, professional quality, dark Sci-fi adventure.

Any money raised beyond goes towards the creation of Chaotic Flux #3.

 

Risks & Challenges

None. The book is finished and shipping now!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. It would be so greatly appreciated.

Remember, IndieGoGo has a sharing tool just for that.

Please share anywhere and everywhere you can. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any place else you can think of.

Every little bit goes a long way! Thank you for your support.

story:
Mark McKenna is a 33 year veteran of the comic book industry. In that time he has worked on Batman, Wolverine, Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk and more recently on Star Wars, counting over 575 comics in all.

Mark's more recent work can be seen in Legendary Picture Books PACIFIC RIM movie prequel, Dark Horse Comics Star Wars-The Old Republic: The Lost Suns. In 2012 his work on the online web comic titled “Star Wars: Blood of the Empire“ was collected into an 84 page trade paperback and was the linchpin for the 2012 released Bio-ware online video game, The Old Republic.

His children’s book series Banana Tail and Friends is a labor of love that he created when his daughter was four and had a newborn son. His most recent Banana Tail project, The BOOnana Tail Halloween Special was released for Halloween 2014 and was treated as an “all ages” comic project that continues to grow with children that had the original storybooks read to them as younger children. The other Banana Tail titles include; Banana Tail’s Tales and Activities, Banana Tail’s Colorful Adventure and the soon-to-be-released Banana Tail and the Checkerboard Jungle

Mark has also created, written, inked and published the Sci Fi/Horror COMBAT JACKS comic book mini series.  This campaign shares the culmination of the 4 issue mini series plus a brand new 5 page prologue story and a FOREWORD by famed director John Carpenter's wife Sandy King Carpenter into this beautiful 144 page hardcover collection. This is what Id like to call a "Second Chance Offer" to get the book while supplies last or if you prefer the comics, Im offering the 4 issue mini series here as well. As a BONUS for pledging for the Collection, Im additionally adding the 48 page horror comic, The Tomb of Baalberith, see below...

 

THE COLLECTION

 

BONUS: Tomb of Baalberith(with pledge of $25)

Anbody who pledges for the Combat Jacks Collection will get a comped autographed copy of the "Tomb" 48 page prestige format comic. This is a "stand alone" horror comic offered simply as a "Thank you" for pledging for the Collection... You can pledge separately for the Baalberith book at the $5 pledge...

 

The COMIC MINI SERIES (w/original #1)

Franchesco Variant

The Space Marine patch

 

The FOREWORD

Some Interiors

story:
The Book

THIS BOOK IS IN OUR WAREHOUSE AND READY TO SHIP! WE JUST NEED YOUR ADDRESS!

  • Art by award-winning artist Ashley Wood
  • Story by Ashley Wood and T P Louise
  • Oversized 12"x 12" hardcover graphic novel
  • 180 full-color pages of gorgeous painted art
  • New cover art by Ashley Wood
  • A limited printing of 500 copies
  • World War Robot is being developed as a major motion picture

The WWR Story

The biggest war in history may just be the end of humanity as we know it. In World War Robot, a dwindling group of humans battles a vicious robot army in a fight for survival that rages across the surface of Earth, the Moon—and even Mars! Pulse-pounding battles, sci-fi action, intense drama, and political intrigue are all washed down with a healthy serving of pitch-black humor in this incredible, limited-edition hardcover book you'll be proud to display on your shelf.

The Indiegogo Exclusive Print

  • Art by Ashley Wood from World War Robot
  • 10" x 10" full-color print
  • Spot varnish makes the image pop
  • Only available through this Indiegogo campaign

Enamel WWR Pin

  • Limited to 100
  • Approximately 1.5" x 1.5"
  • Orders with pins will be shipped on Oct 17th

Zombies vs. Robots Comic Books

  • Includes issues #1-10 of the 2015 series
  • Cover art by Ashley Wood
  • All copies signed by Zombies vs. Robots writer Chris Ryall

String Divers Figure by 3A

  • Approximately 6" tall
  • 25 points of articulation
  • Includes: 1 Quantum Defense Suit, 1 Quantum Propulsion Pack, 3 Weapons, and 1 Stand
  • One of a limited run of 50 originally created for the 2017 San Diego Comic-Con!

Ashley Wood Signed WWR books

  • Limited to only 13 copies
  • Signature plate glued to endpaper
  • Hand-signed by Ashley Wood

B&W Girl Prints Hand-Colored by Ashley Wood

  • Limited to only 3 prints
  • B&W print on white paper, with unique hand-coloring in pink, red, and black marker
  • Approximately 8" x 12"

Original Art Head Sketches

  • Rare sketches by Ashley Wood
  • Limited to only 7 sketches
  • Black marker on white paper
  • Approximately 6" x 8.5"

story:
ABOUT :

                 Drugs have been a part of our culture since the middle of the last century. Popularized in the 1960s by music and mass media, they invade all aspects of society. 
        An estimated 208 million people internationally consume illegal drugs. In the United States, results from the recent  National survey on drug use and health showed that 19.9 million Americans (or 8% of the population aged 12 or older) used illegal drugs in the month prior to the survey.

                   You probably know someone who has been affected by drugs, directly or indirectly.People do drug for various reasons. They think drugs are a solution to a various  problem. But eventually, drugs become the problem.Difficult as it may be to face one’s problems, the consequences of drug abuse are always worse than the problem one is trying to solve.

HOW MANY PEOPLE DIE FROM DRUG OVERDOSE WORLDWIDE?

  In the US alone drug overdose kills more than cars, guns and falling...

source: teens.drugabuse. gov
 
HOW CAN WE STOP THIS MADNESS? 

                        The real answer is to get the facts and not to take drugs in the first place.

Psychologists say, "If  we educate kids about drugs  in the early stages of  their life there is less chance that they might get into this epidemic".
 Children love comics and we believe comics could be used effectively to reach out to them in raising drug awareness and educating the little young minds about drugs with more fun and interesting way through a story and vivid pictures...

     

                 

                                 WHO ARE WE?            

           We are a team of former addicts, addicts in recovery and families associated with drug addicts.We met online, became friends  and initiated this idea of creating this epic graphic novel "NO MORE DRUGS". We want our future generations our kids to stay out of drugs so that they won't go through the path and pain which we and our loved ones have gone through in life.


                    WHAT IS THE STORY ABOUT?       

                            This graphic novel consists of 103 pages (6 chapters) & covers a story about a young teenage guy who gets into drugs as a part of fun along with his friends.       

but ends up getting addicted.......Everything in his life takes a bad turn since then!   

      One day his best friend dies of a drug overdose.He watches how his friend made her family and loved ones cry for her, the pain and suffering she made her family and loved ones undergo....


                        The story also covers the journey through his recovery. The steps he has taken and the process he has followed in breaking the chain of addiction. 

    How his family and community helped him and provided him with emotional backing and support which every drug addict needs badly.

                  

                                 OUR MISSION:           

--To educate school kids about this epidemic and tell them why  one should stay away from it?                          

--To send a strong message towards those people who are mean and judgemental towards drug addicts.

 

       "Addiction is a disease and it should be dealt carefully and sensibly"

 "IF WE START TODAY, TEACHING OUR KIDS ABOUT DRUG ADDICTION ALONG WITH THEIR ABCs and 123s. WE COULD HAVE A GRADUATING CLASS WITHOUT A SINGLE OVERDOSE".

                         

Help us and support us in our mission in bringing a change in this world!

                           Every  $  and   every share counts ..............................   

         -----------------------------------Thank you------------------------

  In the US alone drug overdose kills more than cars, guns and falling...
source: teens.drugabuse. gov   
HOW CAN WE STOP THIS MADNESS? 


                        The real answer is to get the facts and not to take drugs in the first place.


Psychologists say, "If  we educate kids about drugs  in the early stages of  their life there is less chance that they might get into this epidemic".


    Children love comics and we believe comics could be used effectively to reach out to them in raising drug awareness and educating the little young minds about drugs with more fun and interesting way through a story and vivid pictures...

     
                 

                                 WHO ARE WE?            
           We are a team of former addicts, addicts in recovery and families associated with drug addicts.We met online, became friends  and initiated this idea of creating this epic graphic novel "NO MORE DRUGS". We want our future generations our kids to stay out of drugs so that they won't go through the path and pain which we and our loved ones have gone through in life.


                    WHAT IS THE STORY ABOUT?       

                            This graphic novel consists of 103 pages (6 chapters) & covers a story about a young teenage guy who gets into drugs as a part of fun along with his friends.       


but ends up getting addicted.......Everything in his life takes a bad turn since then!   


      One day his best friend dies of a drug overdose.He watches how his friend made her family and loved ones cry for her, the pain and suffering she made her family and loved ones undergo....




                        The story also covers the journey through his recovery. The steps he has taken and the process he has followed in breaking the chain of addiction. 


    How his family and community helped him and provided him with emotional backing and support which every drug addict needs badly.



                  
                                 OUR MISSION:           

--To educate school kids about this epidemic and tell them why  one should stay away from it?                          



--To send a strong message towards those people who are mean and judgemental towards drug addicts.

        "Addiction is a disease and it should be dealt carefully and sensibly" 
 "IF WE START TODAY, TEACHING OUR KIDS ABOUT DRUG ADDICTION ALONG WITH THEIR ABCs and 123s. WE COULD HAVE A GRADUATING CLASS WITHOUT A SINGLE OVERDOSE".
                         
Help us and support us in our mission in bringing a change in this world!
                           Every  $  and   every share counts ..............................   
         -----------------------------------Thank you------------------------

story:
El cómic de Isabel la Católica.

Isabel la católica es un cómic histórico que recoge los momentos más relevantes en la vida de una de las mujeres más importantes de la historia de España. En la historia de Isabel se suceden intrigas, luchas por el trono, guerra y amor. Todos los ingredientes que forman los grandes relatos.

El cómic se compone de 32 páginas a color, con guión y dibujo de Manuel Díaz y color y maquetación de Ester Salguero. La edición se realizará en formato de 17x24cm y encuadernación en grapa.

El autoeditarnos nos permite controlar toda la producción del cómic, realizarlo sin fechas de entrega agobiantes, disfrutando del proceso y de cada etapa. Para todo dibujante es un sueño ver su trabajo publicado y que otras personas puedan disfrutar de ese esfuerzo una vez terminado. Ahora estamos en ese momento, el cómic ya se encuentra concluido y maquetado y sólo necesitamos el apoyo final para poder verlo plasmado en papel.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes.

Lo recaudado se destinará a cubrir parte de los gastos de impresión del cómic (500 ejemplares). Queremos que esta campaña sirva como una plataforma de preventa, de tal forma que todos los mecenas que participen en la campaña recibirán el cómic sin gastos de envío. (Sólo aplicable a los envíos dentro de España o trasladándonos a la época de Isabel, dentro de los reinos de Castilla y Aragón).

Confiamos en que con vuestro apoyo consigamos la meta que nos permita publicar el cómic, en caso de que ese objetivo se superase lo destinaremos a la publicacion de nuestro siguiente proyecto: El cómic de Hernán Cortés. En el supuesto de que no lleguemos a la totalidad del objetivo, lo que se recaude será igualmente destinado a la publicación del cómic de Isabel en papel con una tirada menor y exploraremos los canales de distribución digitales como alternativa.

Dibujos exclusivos.
Además del cómic impreso ofrecemos dibujos exclusivos realizados por los autores. Los artistas de la corte dibujaran para ti a los personajes protagonistas de la historia (Isabel, Fernando, Enrique, Juana, Colón, etc.) o a cualquier otro personaje que te guste y que desees ver plasmado por Manuel o Ester.

Forma parte de la historia.
Te convertiremos en uno de los personajes secundario de nuestro próximo cómic de tal forma que podrás acompañar nada más ni nada menos que a Hernán Cortés en sus aventuras.


Patrocina el viaje de Colón.
Si tienes un negocio o quieres aprovechar esta publicación para darte a conocer hemos preparado algunas recompensas especiales para ti. Igual que Colón tuvo que solicitar patronazgo a los Reyes Católicos para realizar el viaje que descubriría América (uy spoiler) tú puedes patrocinar la publicación de este cómic y enorgullecerte de que ha sido posible gracias a tu aportación.

La corte de Isabel.
Todos los mecenas tendrán un lugar destacado en la corte de Isabel. Tu nombre aparecerá en la página de agradecimientos por haber hecho posible la publicación de este cómic.


Difusión.

Si no puedes hacer una aportación es igualmente necesaria tu ayuda con la difusión de esta campaña. Compártela en tus redes sociales y háblale a tus amigos del cómic de Isabel La Católica.

¡Gracias! Y bienvenido/a a la corte de Isabel.

story:
UPDATE!!!

Thank you to all who donated! It is a huge help! We didn’t make our goal but this is a great start and it is much appreciated! Your donations will go towards great work and we promise not to disappoint!

In addition we plan to hold another fundraiser soon to see if we can raise what is left. So all those who messaged about donating after the end date, not to worry! ^^ There is plenty of time. Now we are off to start work.

Keep checking back here and at the following sites for videos and updates!

Here are a few updates for you to check out right now!

View the Stoybook Archive website

Also click here to download the Comic teaser in PDF format!

 

Greetings and salutations;

My name is Dori Davidson-Revill and I am here to talk about my graphic novel project Gophenwick.  It chronicles the adventures of Zoe, a nine year old clairvoyant prodigy who investigates paranormal mysteries in an alternate reality from our own. Our goal is to create a tale that is unique, fresh, and new; a story that explores myths and folklore that has otherwise been overlooked in the past in favour of shirtless, oiled-up werewolves, and sparkling vampires. I believe this series will have a huge impact upon the paranormal and mythological genres! The series will introduce the audience to Zoe and the supernatural forces to which she comes in contact with!

This story has been a labour of love. Started in 1996 I have been working on it ever since. Experimenting with various formats and tweaking the mythos until I the story right for sharing.

I wish to give our generous supporters more than just the promise that we will use all donated money wisely and efficiently. I want our supporters to feel as involved and excited about Gophenwick as I do! On the sidebar you will find a selection of amazing perks that accompany each donation level. Everything from production art cards to your face in the comic itself! Any donation, no matter how small, would be greatly appreciated.

If possible, please donate, tell your friends, and help us get the word out about Gophenwick. The more supporters we have standing behind us, the closer we are to our dream and sharing with you the chilling tale of Gophenwick. Thank you to everyone for your interest and your support. You are our muse and drive us to give everything we can!

 

The website for the Storybook Archive is still under construction. It will be up very soon and we will post it the moment it goes live. ^^ Thank you for your patience.

 

Here are a few test panels of our artwork.

Kas harassing Zoe while she tries to do her homework.

 

The Storybook Archive is the name of Zoe’s paranormal headquarters located at 411 Storybook Gardens in Calgary Alberta Canada. There she keeps all the artifacts and case files she has worked on since November 22 2011. There is no case to scary, big or impossible that Zoe won’t investigate. She likes a good challenge.

Gophenwick Facebook Page

Dori411.com

story:
Our Story

My Name is Russell Nohelty.  I've got one book, Ichabod Jones:  Monster Hunter, that will be published through Viper Comics later this year.  It's a great book but I want to keep moving forward with new comics as well. My next four issue mini-series will be KATRINA HATES DEAD SHIT. (http://www.katrinacomic.com/)


KATRINA HATES DEAD SHIT follows a badass chick who survives the Rapture and now lives in a small town full of demons, Hellspawn and a smattering of dreadful survivors. 


Things are about as terrible as one would imagine after the Rapture but given the circumstances Katrina is taking not being "blue-lighted" pretty well. Even though she's got a terrible job, horrible co-workers, a leeching ex-roommate and a miserable attitude to boot things could always get worse...somehow.  


Things become so dreadful for Katrina that she decides to fight back in a most extreme manner, by traveling to hell and forcing the Devil to end the Apocalypse once and for all.  


KATRINA HATES DEAD SHIT is a 4 issue mini-series that gives a tongue in cheek look at how surviving the Apocalypse will suck donkey balls but it's not the end of the world. 


Katrina is drawn by the uber talented Juan Frigeri (http://spadjm.deviantart.com/) colored by the amazing Thomas Bacon (http://thomasbacon.webs.com/) and lettered by the fantastic Bernie Lee (http://www.comicspace.com/blee/).  

What We Need & What You Get

I'm already in production on the first issue of Katrina, but I frankly need money to keep this project going through the first issue.  I'm currently in production on three books with a fourth to follow.  Because I use only top quality talent and never scrimp on hiring a fantastic artist it's become too costly to keep more than one book in production at any given time.  


You can see the fruits of hiring top tier talent by reading the first eleven pages of issue #1 at http://www.katrinacomic.com/.


That's where you come in.  Without your help more issues of Katrina Hates Dead Shit might never happen and that would be a shame because it's a great story for any fans of Apocalyptic books, horror books, comedy books or any fan of comics young or old (though not too young).  I like to say that it's Left Behind told as a comedy.   


Take a look at the perks on the side and even if you can help with $1 it would be great.  If you can help more than you'll see some really cool perks including copies of the book all the way up to being drawn as the DEVIL in our final issue!  That's right Katrina travels into Hell to confront the Devil and that could be you!   


I know this is a pretty ambitious goal, but I'm a pretty ambitious guy and I know with your help we'll get there!  


DRAWN INTO THE BOOK


If you decide on a perk that included being drawn into the book, please email me with your choice at katrinahatesdeadshit@gmail.com



Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't get help financially, you can still help get the word out by friending us on facebook, following me on twitter and blasting your friends to help give money to the campaign.
