story:
What happens when two teenage grim reapers are really bad at their jobs? What happens when some scientists create the cure for death? This novel is a tongue-in-cheek look at the world and what it means to be alive... or dead.






What is Carl? Who am I?

My name is Sadie Gilker, the creator of Carl the Grim Reaper. Carl the Grim Reaper is a teenage grim reaper who loves to drink and skateboard. He’s absolutely useless in the best way. Carl has been living in the one-frame comic world for the past two years and it was time about time that he got a proper story. This graphic novel has been my lifeblood for the past year and a half. Lifeblood meaning so many sleepless nights developing the story, painstakingly drawing out each and every page by hand. Then the editing and font finding… it has been such a wild journey, and now we need your help for the final process of raising funds to get it off the computer and into book format!

Carl is a punky teenage grim reaper who is really, really, adorably bad at his job. This story starts with Carl getting his Death card revoked for missing kills, and drinking on the job. And it gets worse. Carl and Jimmy find themselves in real hot water after two scientists find the cure for death. As the world adopts these measures and the death rates begin to fall Carl and Jimmy are forced to act and try and restore the status quo.

Set in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, this 62 page long graphic novel questions what it means to be alive, and what to do when faced with tragedy and hard times.




Why should you back me? And where is the money going?

You should back this project if you love the indie-arts … or if you just love dark humour and all that comes with weird alternate realities about Death and her minions. This is a completely hand drawn comic book that was created with the love and support of friends and many long nights of over caffeination and possibly some tears...

The money is going towards covering the cost of printing the comic book as well as covering the shipping costs of the book. Since I wrote and drew the whole thing I won’t really be taking any profit from this. I just want to get the funds to finally get this book out in the world!

So, you can help me with your contributions!



Contribution Tiers:

5$ you get a Carl the Grim Reaper postcard that you can mail off to anyone you love, or not.

15$ you get one 8x11 print of the cover of the comic book and a postcard.

20$ gets you a copy of the graphic novel

30$ gets you a copy of the graphic novel, the 8x11 poster and the postcard.

50$ you get 2 copies of the comic book, poster and postcard.  

75$ you get the graphic novel, poster, postcard, a handwritten thank you note from Carl and Jimmy and a mention in the “Thank You” section of the graphic novel.

100$ you get 2 copies of the comic book, poster, postcard, handwritten thank you note from Carl and Jimmy, a mention in the “Thank You” section of the graphic novel, and a personalized drawing of yourself as a Grim Reaper!



Risks and Challenges:

This is a relatively risk free investment. The graphic novel is already done and just waiting in the wings for the funding to make it a reality. Once the goal is complete all you would have to do is wait for the printers to run the copies and you can expect the graphic novel at your door!

If we do not reach our goal, I will personally invest my own money in order to make sure that this comic will be delivered on time.

All the hard risks and challenges have already been taken care of behind closed doors. (usually involving me throwing art supplies around the room in a fit from drawing all day and fighting with fonts.)

Other ways you can help:

If you can’t contribute, that’s totally fine, all I ask is that you share this campaign and tag some of your darkest, funniest friends in order to help spread the word!

story:
Hot women kicking ass has long been a fun staple of quality entertainment across all media, especially in comics, and that has certainly always been the case with the Cavewoman. This beautiful, curvaceous creation of Budd Root has faced vicious dinosaurs, evil humans, and horrible monsters. No matter what you throw at her, she always overcomes and she is fearless! This Cavewoman: Greatest Hits book is a celebratory look back at over 20 years of ass-kickery by our tenacious Cavewoman by Devon Massey! For 2 decades now we have followed the exciting tales of Meriem, the Cavewoman, through all kinds of life or death battles that often end with her bloody and naked. Now we have assembled some of the best action-packed panels from Devon’s run of her comics into one cool 28-page issue! (examples below)

 

 

The action-packed, punch to the face that is literally Cavewoman: Greatest Hits, is a brand new collection unlike any other! There really isn’t a narrative story at all, but rather an awesome assemblage of literal HITS! Each panel in the collaged pages of this book are an action shot of someone hitting or getting hit in some brutal and bloody battles! 

 

This Indiegogo Edition also includes 4 incredible full page b&w pinups throughout and at it’s center are 6 brand new full-page splash images of Meriem battling a pack of Raptors in full, glorious color! Then the book concludes with a 4-page, full color preview of "The Yeti Zone" book that is coming soon!  (and shown further down below)

Samples from inside include these new full color splashes shown above, and 2 of the b&w pinups are shown below.

Here is the exclusive Preview, to "The Yeti Zone," exclusive to this crowdfund edition of Greatest Hits and will not be in the retail version in stores.

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Cavewoman: Greatest Hits was originally solicited through Diamond Distribution for a standard release to all comic stores this summer, but due to COVID-19 that was all shut down and an alternative avenue to get the product out to fans was required. Then when Diamond came back, our Greatest Hits was automatically relisted because it was already printed and because we wanted to support the comic stores with new product they desperately need, we didn't pull it from Diamond. But this incredible Indiegogo Edition that we put together is so much more than what you can get from our standard Diamond release. 

 

WHAT YOU GET:

We really wanted to go all out on this while catering to the discerning collector who desires so much more in their comic products, so we put together this amazing crowdfunding edition of the book, which will have 15 total "regular" variant covers and 28 pages of awesome! The usual Cavewoman cover gang is all here, so of course we have series artist DEVON MASSEY doing 3 covers, the creator himself BUDD ROOT doing 2 covers, rising indie star IZIK BELL doing 1 cover and the somewhat new ANDREW HENRY doing 1 cover for the "base set of 7 covers" that will also go to retail in a lesser format. These covers are all pretty amazing already, but we don't stop there and that's not all we have in store for you! 

We will also have brand new exclusive covers that are just for these crowdfunding editions! First we have an awesome Digital 3D cover by Master 3D Guru CLAUDIO MARUCCI doing cover H. Then we have 3 fantastic indie-legend artists doing 3 new covers that will have Clean or Naughty options, and in one case an Ultra Naughty variant! DAVID "The Artassassin" HARRIGAN (probably best known by our fans for his cover work on Lady Death!) does Cover I, MARAT MYCHAELS (industry legend from Image/Extreme, Marvel, DC & so many others and cover artist for seemingly everything these days!) does Cover J, and ANDREW MANGUM (best known for previous Cavewoman work and his cover work for Evil Ernie, Puppet Masters, and Re-Animator!) does Cover K! Then we decided to throw a couple more exclusive covers into the mix including another cover by BUDD ROOT (cover L), cover M by KLEBER LIRA, and cover N by RUBEN CURTO! So these covers and their variants are exclusive to our crowdfunding campaigns only and will not be in stores!

There is also a Campaign Exclusive Blank Sketch Cover Edition by itself for $10 or you can even get it sketched by Devon Massey in one of the pledge levels for just $60! Even better, this Indiegogo edition will also have a brand new, exclusive 4-page preview story for an upcoming book with Meriem battling the Yeti in full color by Devon!

THE COVERS:

The standard cover editions for retail and Indiegogo are essentially the same on the front, which include the 7 variant covers limited here to 200 copies of each cover at max, including 3 covers by Devon Massey (covers A, B, & C), 2 by Budd Root (covers D & E), and one each from Izik Bell (cover F) and Andrew Henry (cover G)! But here we also have the brand new covers only for these campaigns by Claudio Marucci (cover H), David Harrigan (cover I), Marat Mychaels (cover J), Andrew Mangum (cover K), Budd Root (cover L), Kleber Lira (cover M), and Ruben Curto (cover N)!

Plus there will be special variations for covers I, J, & K including Clean (200 copies max), Naughty, (150 copies max) and Ultra Naughty (just 100 copies max). 

*Only Marat's cover J variant comes in an Ultra Naughty (completely nude) variant out of these Campaign Exclusive covers. It will be $25 while supplies last*

Every cover in the campaign is shown below. Regular variants are $15 and Naughty editions are $20.

We are also offering b&w virgin variants of some of the covers that are shown below and they will be far more limited to just 100 copies max of each and just $20 each! 

EXCLUSIVE ENHANCED COVER OPTIONS!

So we took all of this awesomeness and put together a wide selection of incredible pledge-level options to accommodate all budgets, and we are able to do some exciting new cover enhancements as well that we wouldn't normally get to do, exclusively for our backers here! So these Indiegogo editions will also have premium cover enhancement options we cannot do normally including METAL, SILVER, CHROME, VOLCANO CHROME, & CRYSTAL cover stocks. 

(METAL is a front cover printed on actual metal and SILVER looks like polished silver and is somewhat similar to chromium without the embossing and clear-coat. CHROME has a shiny rainbow effect like holofoil, VOLCANO CHROME has a lava chrome effect that is splotchy, and CRYSTAL is prismatic across the whole surface) 

 

*ALL ENHANCED COVERS WILL BE VIRGIN COVERS WITH NO TITLES AND LIMITED TO 100 MAX OF EACH TYPE & VARIANT COVER*

 

In addition to the extra 4-pages of Yeti preview and cover enhancement options, these crowdfunding editions will be clearly marked with the Indiegogo logo on the back cover and ALL variants except cover A (the mass market edition) that are sold here will be numbered with the print run limits on each cover, determined by sales totals! (e.g. Limited to 200, Limited to 100, Limited to 50, etc) This will be a closed edition exclusive to Indiegogo and we will only print what we sell, plus a small amount for our website and a small buffer for damaged or lost mail, etc, so these will be far more rare than the retail edition and clearly numbered as such. All variants in this campaign will be strictly limited to help keep these special and collectible for our original campaign supporters. 

 

ORIGINAL ART COMMISSIONS AVAILABLE!

We also planned all kinds of fun original art pledge levels where you can get anything from a sketch cover sketch ($60 pledge) to a full 11x17 commission by Devon! 

Series artist Devon Massey is excited to make sketch commissions available to the backers that want them. He will do sketches on blank sketch cover editions, 9x12 commissions, and 11x17 commissions! To get one, please pledge for that commission perk level and anything else you want can be an add-on. But the art is one of a kind and only available as a perk and not an add-on, but all the comics are available as add-ons.

 

Here are some examples of his 9x12 commissions, which are $85!

 

Here is an example of an 11x17 piece, which are $150!

 

 

ADD-ONS AVAILABLE:

 

THE COMICS:

You can get any of the regular variant covers A-N as single add-ons, including the Naughty variants (while supplies last) and the blank sketch cover, so you can simply back for any of the rare Perks and then add the other variant covers you want during checkout.

 

MINI-PRINTS SET OF ALL COVERS:

Some of these will be stretch goals throughout this campaign, but we they will also be available as an add-on for the entire set. 

We are offering a set of 4"x6" mini-prints of all 14 cover images A-N for $25! They will all be the naughty "uncensored" versions without any titles or logos (except for cover A which WILL have titles), so only cover images A & G are covered and everything else is topless. 

TRADING CARD ADD-ONS:

Next we have a  7-card Greatest Hits set consisting of 6 full color trading cards featuring the new 6-page short story Devon did for this Greatest Hits release, as well as a 7th black & white Transient Chrome "chase card." The set will be available for $15.

STRETCH GOALS:

We have a lot of cool & exciting stretch goals planned for this campaign including stickers, mini-prints, bookmarks, trading cards & more! We will post them a couple at a time as we reach those goals. Each stretch goal reached will reveal the next couple stretch goal levels. Once we reach our modest initial goal we will have a new stretch goal reward every $2,500 to keep the freebies flowing. We hope you'll enjoy what we have worked up for you!
story_txt: Hot women kicking ass has long been a fun staple of quality entertainment across all media, especially in comics, and that has certainly always been the case with the Cavewoman. This beautiful, curvaceous creation of Budd Root has faced vicious dinosaurs, evil humans, and horrible monsters. No matter what you throw at her, she always overcomes and she is fearless! This Cavewoman: Greatest Hits book is a celebratory look back at over 20 years of ass-kickery by our tenacious Cavewoman by Devon Massey! For 2 decades now we have followed the exciting tales of Meriem, the Cavewoman, through all kinds of life or death battles that often end with her bloody and naked. Now we have assembled some of the best action-packed panels from Devon’s run of her comics into one cool 28-page issue! (examples below)  The action-packed, punch to the face that is literally Cavewoman: Greatest Hits, is a brand new collection unlike any other! There really isn’t a narrative story at all, but rather an awesome assemblage of literal HITS! Each panel in the collaged pages of this book are an action shot of someone hitting or getting hit in some brutal and bloody battles!  This Indiegogo Edition also includes 4 incredible full page b&w pinups throughout and at it’s center are 6 brand new full-page splash images of Meriem battling a pack of Raptors in full, glorious color! Then the book concludes with a 4-page, full color preview of "The Yeti Zone" book that is coming soon!  (and shown further down below)Samples from inside include these new full color splashes shown above, and 2 of the b&w pinups are shown below.Here is the exclusive Preview, to "The Yeti Zone," exclusive to this crowdfund edition of Greatest Hits and will not be in the retail version in stores.  Why Indiegogo?Cavewoman: Greatest Hits was originally solicited through Diamond Distribution for a standard release to all comic stores this summer, but due to COVID-19 that was all shut down and an alternative avenue to get the product out to fans was required. story:
"Huszárok és boszorkányok csapnak össze az árnyak között,
miközben a világot felperzseli a Nagy Háború...
Csillagszeműnek nem csak a túlsó világ borzalmaival,
de saját démonaival is meg kell küzdenie!"
 

Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár egy történelmi ihletésű, misztikus horror-kaland képregény.

A kampányunk célja, hogy a befolyt összegből legyártsuk a megrendelt képregényeket, a fennmaradó hasznot pedig arra fordítjuk, hogy rajzolónk Krisztián, csak a képregénnyel foglalkozhasson annak elkészültéig! 


 

Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár történelmi dráma és természetfeletti horror keveréke, melyben a magyar népmesék, legendák és mitológia világa keveredik a Nagy Háború valós eseményeivel.

A történet megalkotása során valós eseményeket és személyeket tanulmányoztunk – történész konzulensek segítségével – és klasszikus mondák, népmesék elemeit szőttük bele a saját mesénkbe. Mindez kapott egy modern fantasy hangulatot, egy csipetnyi folklórral és gótikus (néhol kozmikus) horrorral megbolondítva.

A képregény első része színesen, 30 oldalon érkezik.
A sorozat első ciklusát 6 részesre tervezzük, melyet egy nulladik, bevezető mini-epizód,
a "Füstbe ment terv" egészít ki. 


...de a színfalak mögött dúl egy másik háború is! 

A történet egy paranormális ügyekkel foglalkozó titkos huszárszervezettel, a Fekete mentésekkel foglalkozik, köztük is főképp Csillagszeművel, aki egy különleges képességű és különösen forrófejű tagja a tizenkettesek, azaz a "boszorkányosok" csapatának.

A történet első hat részének folyamán bejárjuk majd a háború sújtotta Európa legsötétebb zugait, köztük több legendás helyszínt is, ahol valós történelmi személyekkel is találkozni fogunk.

A történet elsősorban mégis a csapatról szól, arról a hat elit katonáról, akik a tizenkettesek szívét-lelkét és lángoló kardját alkotják és akik feladata, hogy kordában tartsák a folyamatosan jelenlévő természetfeletti fenyegetést!

Ismerjétek meg a tizenkettesek elit katonáit: 

Büszkék vagyunk rá, hogy a képregény alkotócsapatához hazánk TOP rajzolói közül többen is csatlakoztak, hogy alkotásaikkal emeljék a kampányunk és a Huszárok világának fényét. 

Vendék alkotóink műveit nem csak alternatív borító, de akár poszter formájában is megszerezhetitek, valamint azok bekerülnek a "Rendezői", a "Páros csomag" és a "Gyűjtői kiadású" csomagjainkba is (a 80+ oldalas képregény belső mellékleteként). 

​Köszönjük a közreműködést az alábbi alkotóinknak!
Nóthóf Ferenc, László Márk, Németh Gyula, Felvidéki Miklós, Lakatos István  és Lanczinger Mátyás.

FONTOS: Azoknál a csomagoknál, ahol választhatók a borító vagy poszter minták az alkotókat a kezdőbetűikkel jelöltük meg. Nóthóf Ferenc (NF), László Márk (LM), Németh Gyula (NGY), Felvidéki Miklós (FM), Lakatos István (LI) és Lanczinger Mátyás (LMÁ) 
 


Példák az alternatív borítókra:
 

Alternatív borítók esetében szintén a 6 vendég alkotó képei értendőek és ugyan azok a jelölések (NF, LM, stb...) érvényesek rájuk.


 

A képregényt 10 különböző csomagban érhetitek el (6 nyomtatott, 2 digitális és 2 kiegészítő), ami mellett hazánk 6 top rajzolójának műveit is megszerezhetitek alternatív borító vagy poszter formájában. 

Próbáltuk a csomagokat úgy összeállítani, hogy mindenki megtalálja benne amit keres, az alap csomagok pedig lehetővé teszik akár egyedi, saját pakkok összeállítását is!

* a figura terv Béres Rudolf munkája: https://www.artstation.com/brud


A postaköltség nincs benne a csomagárakban, azt a gyártás után fogjuk pontosan meghatározni. Ezt mindenkivel a kampány lezárása után tisztázni fogjuk és lehet majd több lehetőség közül választani (posta/csomagpont/futárszolgálat/személyes átvétel). 

DE! Míg biztosan lesznek sokan, akiknek csak a posta az egyedüli alternatíva, szeretnénk mindenkit a személyes átvételre buzdítani, aki csak megteheti, hogy jelen legyen a PREMIER BULIN, amit azért fogunk tartani Budapesten, hogy...

  • élőben kaphassátok kézhez a csomagjaitokat 

  • megspóroljátok a postaköltséget

  • plakátok, pólók, egyéb nehezen postázható dolgok ne sérüljenek

  • találkozhassatok velünk, az alkotókkal

  • és együtt bulizzunk egy jó huszárosat!

Külföldi postázás: Természetesen tudunk külföldre is postázni, ebben az esetben azonban értelemszerűen jóval magasabb lesz a postaköltség. Természetesen minden támogatóval fel fogjuk venni a kapcsolatot és megpróbáljuk a legkényelmesebb és legolcsóbb, legbiztonságosabb megoldást megtalálni. 

Legfontosabb célunk természetesen a képregény első részének minél hamarabbi elkészítése és eljuttatása az előrendelőkhöz. Van azonban pár tervünk arra az esetre is, ha sikerül túllépnünk az elsődleges célunkat.



Az elsődleges célig elért összegből a nyomdai és egyéb költségeken felüli nyereséget arra fordítjuk, hogy Krisztián csak ezzel foglalkozva 4-5 hónapon belül elkészítse az első részt.

Ez idő alatt nem vállal más munkát és nem foglalkozik mással, így biztosan a tervezett minőségben, színes formában, kiegészítő elemekkel együtt el tudja készíteni a képregényt, valamint ebből az összegből már jut a nyomdán és egyéb költségeken kívül arra is, hogy megalapozzuk vele az egész sorozatot! (azaz annak első 5 részét)



A második célunk László Márk képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Márk rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.



Harmadik célunk Németh Gyula képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Gyula rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.

Negyedik célunk Nóthóf Ferenc képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Feri rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.



Ötödik célunk a kemény borítós rendezői kötetek elkészítése. Ha ez a cél teljesül, minden 80+ oldalas nyomdai kötetünket kemény borítóval készítjük el és adjuk át, illetve postázzuk a rendelőinknek, attól függetlenül, hogy a sima rendezői csomagban vagy a legfullosabb gyűjtői kiadásban lenne-e benne.

Hatodik célunk Csepella Olivér egyedi borító variánsa. Mivel az Indiegogo visszamenőleg nem engedi, hogy belenyúljunk már létező csomagokba, ez a borító variáns külön csomagként lesz elérhető, az eredeti Alternatív kiadással megegyező tartalommal és áron.

 

Hetedik célunk egy dedikált Ex Libris, azaz betétlap (A5 méretű, vastag kártya) a Rendezői, a Páros és a Gyűjtői csomagokhoz (visszamenőleg is), azaz minden 80+ oldalas kötet mellé. A lap egy egyedi, CSAK az indiegogo-s rendelőknek elérhető képet jelent, a két alkotó dedikálásával.

 Nyolcadik célunk +4 oldal a képregénybe! Ezzel a kötet hosszabb lesz, a történet pedig kap két extra jelenetet. A bővülés vonatkozik mindegyik csomagra a digitálistól egészen a gyűjtői kiadásig. 

Kilencedik célunk egy profi 3D szobrásszal terveztetett Csillagszemű figura, amit ki is nyomtattatunk 3D-s nyomtatóval, majd egy új (szuper-limitált) csomagban elérhető lesz minden új és már meglévő rendelőnk számára! 


 

Tizedik célunk: Függetlenül attól, hogy milyen csomagot rendeltetek (digitális vagy nyomtatott, sima, extra vagy gyűjtői) +6 oldal jár a képregénybe! 2 oldallal lesz hosszabb a történet, míg a kötet 4 extra oldalt is kap, ami a mentések két tagjának katonai aktáját és bemutató oldalát fogja tartalmazni részletes leírásokkal és képekkel.  

Tizenegyedik cél: Ha elérjük a 15.000 dolláros összeget, mindenkinek (aki kéri) profi makettfestő fogja kézzel kifesteni a figuráját, a nem figurás csomagokat rendelők pedig egyedi, kétoldalas könyvjelzőt kapnak!

Mivel a kampány flexibilis finanszírozású, mindenkinek, aki itt előrendeli valamelyik csomagot, azt le is fogjuk szállítani, hisz a kampány sikeressége nem függ attól, hogy elérjük-e a kívánt célösszeget. De akkor miért az Indiegogo és miért nem egy sima előrendeléses rendszer?

A képregény - mint mondtuk - mindenképpen megjelenik... egyszer. Azonban nem mindegy, hogy mikor! Minél több előrendelésünk gyűlik össze, annál hamarabb készül el a sorozat első része.  Hogy miért?

  • Krisztián, rajzolónk csak abban az esetben tudja főállásként rajzolni a képregényt, ha sikerül annyi támogatást gyűjtenünk, hogy az egész napos rajzolás mellett jusson neki sok kávéra és talán még tejre és kenyérre is. Magyarán Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár legyen az egyetlen munkája és bevételi forrása az idő alatt, amíg a képregény készül. Ez az első célszámunk.
     
  •  Ha összejön a kívánt összeg, abból tudjuk fedezni a nyomdai és egyéb költségeket (+ az indiegogo saját %-át) valamint Krisztián tud majd elég időt fordítani a képregényre, hogy az mihamarabb megjelenhessen immáron a 0. résszel ellentétben színes formában, sok-sok extrával együtt (karakterlapok, poszterek, novella, stb...). 
     
  • Amennyiben nem érjük el az első célt, csüggedni akkor sem kell! A beérkező összeget ugyanis elsősorban a nyomdai munkálatokra, kivitelezésre fordítjuk, csak az ezeken felüli összeget fogjuk felhasználni megélhetési célokra. Első a képregény, aztán jövünk mi, alkotók. 

A rizikót tehát ez esetben leginkább mi magunk vállaljuk, hisz a minimum célösszeget úgy kalkuláltuk, hogy éppen fedezzen minden felmerülő költséget és ne kelljen a családi kasszánkban turkálnunk a maradék költségek fedezése okán. Ezen célösszegen felül már minden beérkezett forint ajándék, amit a képregény alkotás támogatására tudunk fordítani, valamint olyan extrák tető alá hozására, mint a vendégrajzolók által készített extra epizódok vagy a képregény keménykötésű rendezői változata. 

VARGA BÁLINT BÁNK - ÍRÓ, KÉPREGÉNYALKOTÓ

Imádja a történelmet, a meséket, a film-noirt, a scifit
és a misztikumot. Képregények, novellák írása mellett főképp videojáték fejlesztéssel foglalkozik és
a családjának él. Kisfia, Ábel 4 és fél éves, kedvenc
hősei Batman és Porco Rosso.  

 

 

 


TULI KRISZTIÁN - KÉPREGÉNYRAJZOLÓ,
KARAKTER TERVEZŐ

Szenvedélyes képregény és akciófigura gyűjtő.
Imádja a punk-rockot, a B-horrort, a westernt és
a rajzfilmeket. A képregényrajzolással legnagyobb
álma válik éppen valóra. Jelenleg a Balaton partján él
feleségével, Adrival, akivel egymás mellett alkotnak.





Biztosan van, aki nem tudja a kampány 45 napja alatt előrendelni a képregényt. Semmi gond, ha szeretnél mégis segíteni, megteheted! 

  • Minden megosztás, bejegyzés óriási értékkel bír. Ha megosztod a kampányunkat, videónkat, oldalunkat, bármit, ami velünk kapcsolatos, sokat segítesz nekünk!
     
  • Elindítottuk Patreon oldalunkat is, ahol folyamatosan támogathatjátok a projektet havonta, akár csak egy kávé árával sok kicsi sokra megy alapon. Ezért cserébe mi hozzáférést adunk az exkluzív, csak Patreonos támogatóknak fenntartott alkotói blogunkhoz és támogatói csomagonként egyéb extrákkal is készültünk: 
    https://www.patreon.com/azutolsoelottihuszar
story_txt:
"Huszárok és boszorkányok csapnak össze az árnyak között,miközben a világot felperzseli a Nagy Háború...Csillagszeműnek nem csak a túlsó világ borzalmaival,de saját démonaival is meg kell küzdenie!" 
Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár egy történelmi ihletésű, misztikus horror-kaland képregény.A kampányunk célja, hogy a befolyt összegből legyártsuk a megrendelt képregényeket, a fennmaradó hasznot pedig arra fordítjuk, hogy rajzolónk Krisztián, csak a képregénnyel foglalkozhasson annak elkészültéig! 


 
Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár történelmi dráma és természetfeletti horror keveréke, melyben a magyar népmesék, legendák és mitológia világa keveredik a Nagy Háború valós eseményeivel.A történet megalkotása során valós eseményeket és személyeket tanulmányoztunk – történész konzulensek segítségével – és klasszikus mondák, népmesék elemeit szőttük bele a saját mesénkbe. Mindez kapott egy modern fantasy hangulatot, egy csipetnyi folklórral és gótikus (néhol kozmikus) horrorral megbolondítva.A képregény első része színesen, 30 oldalon érkezik.A sorozat első ciklusát 6 részesre tervezzük, melyet egy nulladik, bevezető mini-epizód,a "Füstbe ment terv" egészít ki. 


...de a színfalak mögött dúl egy másik háború is! A történet egy paranormális ügyekkel foglalkozó titkos huszárszervezettel, a Fekete mentésekkel foglalkozik, köztük is főképp Csillagszeművel, aki egy különleges képességű és különösen forrófejű tagja a tizenkettesek, azaz a "boszorkányosok" csapatának.A történet első hat részének folyamán bejárjuk majd a háború sújtotta Európa legsötétebb zugait, köztük több legendás helyszínt is, ahol valós történelmi személyekkel is találkozni fogunk.A történet elsősorban mégis a csapatról szól, arról a hat elit katonáról, akik a tizenkettesek szívét-lelkét és lángoló kardját alkotják és akik feladata, hogy kordában tartsák a folyamatosan jelenlévő természetfeletti fenyegetést!Ismerjétek meg a tizenkettesek elit katonáit: 




Büszkék vagyunk rá, hogy a képregény alkotócsapatához hazánk TOP rajzolói közül többen is csatlakoztak, hogy alkotásaikkal emeljék a kampányunk és a Huszárok világának fényét. Vendék alkotóink műveit nem csak alternatív borító, de akár poszter formájában is megszerezhetitek, valamint azok bekerülnek a "Rendezői", a "Páros csomag" és a "Gyűjtői kiadású" csomagjainkba is (a 80+ oldalas képregény belső mellékleteként). ​Köszönjük a közreműködést az alábbi alkotóinknak!Nóthóf Ferenc, László Márk, Németh Gyula, Felvidéki Miklós, Lakatos István  és Lanczinger Mátyás.FONTOS: Azoknál a csomagoknál, ahol választhatók a borító vagy poszter minták az alkotókat a kezdőbetűikkel jelöltük meg. Nóthóf Ferenc (NF), László Márk (LM), Németh Gyula (NGY), Felvidéki Miklós (FM), Lakatos István (LI) és Lanczinger Mátyás (LMÁ)  




Példák az alternatív borítókra: 

Alternatív borítók esetében szintén a 6 vendég alkotó képei értendőek és ugyan azok a jelölések (NF, LM, stb...) érvényesek rájuk.




 

A képregényt 10 különböző csomagban érhetitek el (6 nyomtatott, 2 digitális és 2 kiegészítő), ami mellett hazánk 6 top rajzolójának műveit is megszerezhetitek alternatív borító vagy poszter formájában. Próbáltuk a csomagokat úgy összeállítani, hogy mindenki megtalálja benne amit keres, az alap csomagok pedig lehetővé teszik akár egyedi, saját pakkok összeállítását is!


* a figura terv Béres Rudolf munkája: https://www.artstation.com/brud
A postaköltség nincs benne a csomagárakban, azt a gyártás után fogjuk pontosan meghatározni. Ezt mindenkivel a kampány lezárása után tisztázni fogjuk és lehet majd több lehetőség közül választani (posta/csomagpont/futárszolgálat/személyes átvétel). DE! Míg biztosan lesznek sokan, akiknek csak a posta az egyedüli alternatíva, szeretnénk mindenkit a személyes átvételre buzdítani, aki csak megteheti, hogy jelen legyen a PREMIER BULIN, amit azért fogunk tartani Budapesten, hogy...

élőben kaphassátok kézhez a csomagjaitokat 
megspóroljátok a postaköltséget
plakátok, pólók, egyéb nehezen postázható dolgok ne sérüljenek
találkozhassatok velünk, az alkotókkal
és együtt bulizzunk egy jó huszárosat!


Külföldi postázás: Természetesen tudunk külföldre is postázni, ebben az esetben azonban értelemszerűen jóval magasabb lesz a postaköltség. Természetesen minden támogatóval fel fogjuk venni a kapcsolatot és megpróbáljuk a legkényelmesebb és legolcsóbb, legbiztonságosabb megoldást megtalálni. 

Legfontosabb célunk természetesen a képregény első részének minél hamarabbi elkészítése és eljuttatása az előrendelőkhöz. Van azonban pár tervünk arra az esetre is, ha sikerül túllépnünk az elsődleges célunkat.
Az elsődleges célig elért összegből a nyomdai és egyéb költségeken felüli nyereséget arra fordítjuk, hogy Krisztián csak ezzel foglalkozva 4-5 hónapon belül elkészítse az első részt.Ez idő alatt nem vállal más munkát és nem foglalkozik mással, így biztosan a tervezett minőségben, színes formában, kiegészítő elemekkel együtt el tudja készíteni a képregényt, valamint ebből az összegből már jut a nyomdán és egyéb költségeken kívül arra is, hogy megalapozzuk vele az egész sorozatot! (azaz annak első 5 részét)A második célunk László Márk képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Márk rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.
Harmadik célunk Németh Gyula képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Gyula rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.

Negyedik célunk Nóthóf Ferenc képregénye, azaz egy eredeti Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár mini-történet, melyet Feri rajzol meg és melyben a történet kitalálásában is aktívan részt vállal.
Ötödik célunk a kemény borítós rendezői kötetek elkészítése. Ha ez a cél teljesül, minden 80+ oldalas nyomdai kötetünket kemény borítóval készítjük el és adjuk át, illetve postázzuk a rendelőinknek, attól függetlenül, hogy a sima rendezői csomagban vagy a legfullosabb gyűjtői kiadásban lenne-e benne.

Hatodik célunk Csepella Olivér egyedi borító variánsa. Mivel az Indiegogo visszamenőleg nem engedi, hogy belenyúljunk már létező csomagokba, ez a borító variáns külön csomagként lesz elérhető, az eredeti Alternatív kiadással megegyező tartalommal és áron. 
Hetedik célunk egy dedikált Ex Libris, azaz betétlap (A5 méretű, vastag kártya) a Rendezői, a Páros és a Gyűjtői csomagokhoz (visszamenőleg is), azaz minden 80+ oldalas kötet mellé. A lap egy egyedi, CSAK az indiegogo-s rendelőknek elérhető képet jelent, a két alkotó dedikálásával.

 Nyolcadik célunk +4 oldal a képregénybe! Ezzel a kötet hosszabb lesz, a történet pedig kap két extra jelenetet. A bővülés vonatkozik mindegyik csomagra a digitálistól egészen a gyűjtői kiadásig. 

Kilencedik célunk egy profi 3D szobrásszal terveztetett Csillagszemű figura, amit ki is nyomtattatunk 3D-s nyomtatóval, majd egy új (szuper-limitált) csomagban elérhető lesz minden új és már meglévő rendelőnk számára! 

 

Tizedik célunk: Függetlenül attól, hogy milyen csomagot rendeltetek (digitális vagy nyomtatott, sima, extra vagy gyűjtői) +6 oldal jár a képregénybe! 2 oldallal lesz hosszabb a történet, míg a kötet 4 extra oldalt is kap, ami a mentések két tagjának katonai aktáját és bemutató oldalát fogja tartalmazni részletes leírásokkal és képekkel.  

Tizenegyedik cél: Ha elérjük a 15.000 dolláros összeget, mindenkinek (aki kéri) profi makettfestő fogja kézzel kifesteni a figuráját, a nem figurás csomagokat rendelők pedig egyedi, kétoldalas könyvjelzőt kapnak!

Mivel a kampány flexibilis finanszírozású, mindenkinek, aki itt előrendeli valamelyik csomagot, azt le is fogjuk szállítani, hisz a kampány sikeressége nem függ attól, hogy elérjük-e a kívánt célösszeget. De akkor miért az Indiegogo és miért nem egy sima előrendeléses rendszer?A képregény - mint mondtuk - mindenképpen megjelenik... egyszer. Azonban nem mindegy, hogy mikor! Minél több előrendelésünk gyűlik össze, annál hamarabb készül el a sorozat első része.  Hogy miért?

Krisztián, rajzolónk csak abban az esetben tudja főállásként rajzolni a képregényt, ha sikerül annyi támogatást gyűjtenünk, hogy az egész napos rajzolás mellett jusson neki sok kávéra és talán még tejre és kenyérre is. Magyarán Az Utolsó Előtti Huszár legyen az egyetlen munkája és bevételi forrása az idő alatt, amíg a képregény készül. Ez az első célszámunk. 
 Ha összejön a kívánt összeg, abból tudjuk fedezni a nyomdai és egyéb költségeket (+ az indiegogo saját %-át) valamint Krisztián tud majd elég időt fordítani a képregényre, hogy az mihamarabb megjelenhessen immáron a 0. résszel ellentétben színes formában, sok-sok extrával együtt (karakterlapok, poszterek, novella, stb...).  
Amennyiben nem érjük el az első célt, csüggedni akkor sem kell! A beérkező összeget ugyanis elsősorban a nyomdai munkálatokra, kivitelezésre fordítjuk, csak az ezeken felüli összeget fogjuk felhasználni megélhetési célokra. Első a képregény, aztán jövünk mi, alkotók. 

A rizikót tehát ez esetben leginkább mi magunk vállaljuk, hisz a minimum célösszeget úgy kalkuláltuk, hogy éppen fedezzen minden felmerülő költséget és ne kelljen a családi kasszánkban turkálnunk a maradék költségek fedezése okán. Ezen célösszegen felül már minden beérkezett forint ajándék, amit a képregény alkotás támogatására tudunk fordítani, valamint olyan extrák tető alá hozására, mint a vendégrajzolók által készített extra epizódok vagy a képregény keménykötésű rendezői változata.

Imádja a történelmet, a meséket, a film-noirt, a scifités a misztikumot. Képregények, novellák írása mellett főképp videojáték fejlesztéssel foglalkozik ésa családjának él. Kisfia, Ábel 4 és fél éves, kedvenchősei Batman és Porco Rosso.

story:
Here's what the people are saying about Sails of Blood

"Ozzy Longoria produced an impressive high-caliber comic, full of action and depth. Sails of Blood proves that Ozzy is still not messing around."  — Mike May, Artist for the Eisner Award winning anthology, Comic Book Tattoo and video game artist.

"Ozzy Longoria and Crisman Strunk are one of my favorite creative teams; the story is so action-packed, it drew me right in, which is difficult for *anything* involving zombies or vampires and this has BOTH!".   --Michael Marcus Publisher/Owner at Hamtramck Idea Men Comics

Sails of Blood is a non-stop thrill ride of comic genius. Ozzy is one of the hardest working guys in comics he'll grab you with his art, shock you with his horror, then tickle your funny bone with his dark humor. This is the ultimate combination of fan-boy genres. Pirates, nuns, and demons, oh my!---Brian Germain Executive Director Dark Elf Designs LLC

"Ozzy Longoria's spectacular artwork weaves his tale of Nathaniel Demon and takes you through the dark and twisted pages of Sails of Blood - Five Stars!" ---Jake Mackessy ,Owner of Mercenary Art Studio.

"The artwork is brilliant, great action sequences, I want a copy for sure, I love nuns." ---   Aru Singh, Owner/Creator of Rising Sun Comics.

 "This looks bad ass!!! And a MUST HAVE!"--- Erik Dee Fullmer ,HORace ROveR High comic

 "This is uncapped delivery of serious awesome, and we're all going to weigh anchor for departure on a sea of marvelous adventure."   — Mike May, Artist for the Eisner Award winning anthology, Comic Book Tattoo and video game artist.
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

THE TEAM

Ozzy Longoria Studied under Mexican comic book legend and Eisner award winner Oscar Gonzalez Loyo, he has published several series, anthologies and Graphic Novels,currently works for Cryptozoic Entertainment. 

Wilson Ramos, Jr is a Comic Book Artist who's worked on such titles as Wolverine, Thor, Deadpool and Spider-Woman to name a few.  He has just started to work for DC Comics’ Manga section called CMX.His work experience includes 10 years at Marvel Comics, he was nominated for Squiddie award for coloring. His most recent projects includes coloring and lettering for War of The IndependentsHe now works on Sketch Cards for Topps, Upper Deck & Cryptozoic Entertainment.

Crisman Strunk -  writer of several published books such as  Elemental Fources

Marco Antonio Najera - comic book creator and letterer.

J.W.Mills Campaign Manager.

Nellie Wigal- Editor


"Sails of Blood" is the prequel of another series of dark humor comic books we are working on about a character and comic book called “Nathaniel Demon” (http://longoria7.tripod.com/id12.html). I cannot tell you much about it without spoiling it, but in this story arc, he becomes a Pirate and this is one of his many adventures. It starts in the 1700s, when the Vampire/Pirate Jacob Nathaniel Van Ritter is sailing the Caribbean waters with his Mayan crew, looking for an unknown artifact that will cure him of his thirst for blood. He is also being unknowingly followed by a group of terrible adversaries who have sworn to destroy him. Expect horror, action and adventure!

We were planing to print it in a series of 3 comic books, but we've now decided to publish it as a Trade Paper Back Graphic Novel. We'll print as many copies as we can if we meet our goal, and if we get enough extra funding we will go for a hard cover format. We'll also be printing some limited edition t-shirts with original artwork of a vampire Jolly Roger (see video and pic), plus many other outstanding rewards.

we have finished Pencils inks and colors and I'm currently working on the lettering for the first pages of "Sails of Blood". With your funding we intend to pay for the lettering for the rest of the book. Any additional funds will go towards printing costs for the 100-page (aprox) trade paperback, and we're planning to have the book ready roughly one month after we start this campaign so you wont have to wait until the end of the campaign's time we will send you the book and other incentives ASAP. 

You can follow updates, watch videos and samples of the colored pages on Facebook as well at BLOGGER, so please subscribe, here's how:

Join into the new 

"Sails of Blood" the Pirate graphic novel group @ Facebook. ENTER and hit the "LIKE" button!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sails-of-Blood/212080775489283

If you cannot help monetarily please help posting this link on your facebook and tell your friends about it, any help is greatly appreciated 

Just needed to post something quick to clarify our policy on international shipping for reward items-

Any rewards earned will include free shipping to the US, Canada, & Mexico. We will ship to other countries for an additional amount, determined by the country in which the item(s) will be shipped.

Thanks for stopping by! We appreciate your contribution! Enjoy the preview


Velas de Sangre en Español 

Campaña Indie Gogo para colectar fondos e imprimir la novela grafica “Sails of Blood” de Piratas, Vampiros, Zombies y Mayas.

Esto no es solo una donacion , sino un intercambio, un patronaje, Asi es como funciona, con Indie Gogo solo nesecitas una cuenta de PAYPAL, cheques y/o una tarjeta de credito para ayudar , para mas informacion vayan a www.indiegogo.com y busquen “Sails of Blood” (Velas de Sangre) o mandenme cualquier pregunta a (longoria7@hotmail.com)

Si no pueden ayudar monetariamente , porfavor ayuden a correr la voz acerca del projecto y la campaña, un minuto de su tiempo para poner el enlace en su facebook, aqui esta:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sails-of-Blood/21...

Muchas Gracias , agradecemos su colaboracion para hacer de este comic epico la mejor novela grafica de Piratas.

Sails of Blood is a non-stop thrill ride of comic genius. Ozzy is one of the hardest working guys in comics he'll grab you with his art, shock you with his horror, then tickle your funny bone with his dark humor. This is the ultimate combination of fan-boy genres. Pirates, nuns, and demons, oh my!---Brian Germain Executive Director Dark Elf Designs LLC
"Ozzy Longoria's spectacular artwork weaves his tale of Nathaniel Demon and takes you through the dark and twisted pages of Sails of Blood - Five Stars!" ---Jake Mackessy ,Owner of Mercenary Art Studio.
"The artwork is brilliant, great action sequences, I want a copy for sure, I love nuns." ---   Aru Singh, Owner/Creator of Rising Sun Comics.


 "This looks bad ass!!! And a MUST HAVE!"--- Erik Dee Fullmer ,HORace ROveR High comic "This is uncapped delivery of serious awesome, and we're all going to weigh anchor for departure on a sea of marvelous adventure."   — Mike May, Artist for the Eisner Award winning anthology, Comic Book Tattoo and video game artist.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________THE TEAM
Ozzy Longoria Studied under Mexican comic book legend and Eisner award winner Oscar Gonzalez Loyo, he has published several series, anthologies and Graphic Novels,currently works for Cryptozoic Entertainment. 

Wilson Ramos, Jr is a Comic Book Artist who's worked on such titles as Wolverine, Thor, Deadpool and Spider-Woman to name a few.  He has just started to work for DC Comics’ Manga section called CMX.His work experience includes 10 years at Marvel Comics, he was nominated for Squiddie award for coloring. His most recent projects includes coloring and lettering for War of The IndependentsHe now works on Sketch Cards for Topps, Upper Deck & Cryptozoic Entertainment.


Crisman Strunk -  writer of several published books such as  Elemental Fources

Marco Antonio Najera - comic book creator and letterer.
J.W.Mills Campaign Manager.
Nellie Wigal- Editor




"Sails of Blood" is the prequel of another series of dark humor comic books we are working on about a character and comic book called “Nathaniel Demon” (http://longoria7.tripod.com/id12.html). I cannot tell you much about it without spoiling it, but in this story arc, he becomes a Pirate and this is one of his many adventures. It starts in the 1700s, when the Vampire/Pirate Jacob Nathaniel Van Ritter is sailing the Caribbean waters with his Mayan crew, looking for an unknown artifact that will cure him of his thirst for blood. He is also being unknowingly followed by a group of terrible adversaries who have sworn to destroy him. Expect horror, action and adventure!
We were planing to print it in a series of 3 comic books, but we've now decided to publish it as a Trade Paper Back Graphic Novel. We'll print as many copies as we can if we meet our goal, and if we get enough extra funding we will go for a hard cover format. We'll also be printing some limited edition t-shirts with original artwork of a vampire Jolly Roger (see video and pic), plus many other outstanding rewards.we have finished Pencils inks and colors and I'm currently working on the lettering for the first pages of "Sails of Blood". With your funding we intend to pay for the lettering for the rest of the book. Any additional funds will go towards printing costs for the 100-page (aprox) trade paperback, and we're planning to have the book ready roughly one month after we start this campaign so you wont have to wait until the end of the campaign's time we will send you the book and other incentives ASAP. You can follow updates, watch videos and samples of the colored pages on Facebook as well at BLOGGER, so please subscribe, here's how:Join into the new "Sails of Blood" the Pirate graphic novel group @ Facebook. ENTER and hit the "LIKE" button!
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sails-of-Blood/212080775489283
If you cannot help monetarily please help posting this link on your facebook and tell your friends about it, any help is greatly appreciated 
Just needed to post something quick to clarify our policy on international shipping for reward items-
Any rewards earned will include free shipping to the US, Canada, & Mexico. We will ship to other countries for an additional amount, determined by the country in which the item(s) will be shipped.

Thanks for stopping by! We appreciate your contribution! Enjoy the preview



Velas de Sangre en Español 
Campaña Indie Gogo para colectar fondos e imprimir la novela grafica “Sails of Blood” de Piratas, Vampiros, Zombies y Mayas.
Esto no es solo una donacion , sino un intercambio, un patronaje, Asi es como funciona, con Indie Gogo solo nesecitas una cuenta de PAYPAL, cheques y/o una tarjeta de credito para ayudar , para mas informacion vayan a www.indiegogo.com y busquen “Sails of Blood” (Velas de Sangre) o mandenme cualquier pregunta a (longoria7@hotmail.com)

Si no pueden ayudar monetariamente , porfavor ayuden a correr la voz acerca del projecto y la campaña, un minuto de su tiempo para poner el enlace en su facebook, aqui esta:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sails-of-Blood/21...Muchas Gracias , agradecemos su colaboracion para hacer de este comic epico la mejor novela grafica de Piratas.

story:
Hullo!

Hullo Folks, thanks for reading! =) First of all, i'm sure most of you have read this webcomic (thank you x). 

if not, you can read the whole thing here, at http://meteorflo.thewebcomic.com

the Ideas/inspiration behind this comic-

so about 2 years ago, I had a little idea for a comic story. I am used to comics on the UK shelves being separated into very set genres and groups- and at the time, and i was used to a lot of stories were very 'dark', 'sad' and 'serious' *laugh*

so the idea behind this story was just to do something fun, not so...epic! and I hoped with this story to simply make a comic that was fun, entertaining, heart warming- but most of all, i just want to achieve what i feel all comics should achieve- something that everyone can just relate to in a personal way =)

so, as a result 'Penelope's far-out-mantic' was my labour of love , and first long-running webcomic =)

 it is comic based loosely around my own personal experiences, mixed with various fashion and music movements as a representation of creativity and art.

Thank you so much for your support, you silly people <3

so...2 years later, and it has come such a long way. I cannot believe the amount of support and love this comic has received, and i cannot thank you fellas enough- it's simply overwhelming =') 
All I want now, is the money to simply put this story into one big lovely, well made graphic novel- so i figured something like this would be a good idea, since i don't have the money myself.

the money raised will simply go towards making these books, and that's it- I may/may not get an ISBN in order for it to be brought thru amazon and stuff like that <)

After thought...

personally, i strive to find comics that holds no genre. i am sick of separations between 'manga' 'marvel' 'indie'- i am a believer in the idea that you can fall into more than one category, there is no right or wrong- the world, your life, should always be moving forward- and that is this comic in all senses =)

story:
Welcome to Vampire, PA

Not all that long ago, Dean Marklin was a regular HVAC sales and repairman in his hometown of Dormont, Pennsylvania, a long established suburb in the south hills of Pittsburgh. Then he discovered that his childhood favorite cinema, long abandoned, was home to a clan of vampires. And then, to his surprise, he discovered he was really good at fighting vampires.

Six months later, Dean, his fiancé Dee Dee O'Day, and his day job boss Scuba Dave Donovan, own that old movie theater and have turned the battle against vampire queen Jocelyn into an all-out war. Only now there’s a new challenger to Jocelyn’s power, and that challenger looks an awful lot like Al Capone.

And oh, yeah, Dee Dee's been turned into a vampire and she's distinctly not happy about it!

This special ones-shot is 28-pages of story and art with 4 pages of bonus features. Yeah, so there might be an ad on the back cover, so we can’t quite say “no ads,” but it genuinely is one seriously packed comic book. You don’t have to have read the original trade paperback to enjoy this one (it’s great if you have, but it’s okay if you haven’t).

  • Other than our thank-you page, the files for the entire comic are complete and ready to print. No kidding! We're looking for your help to upgrade the printing, particularly our cover treatments, so we can better show off the great art and bump up the perks for our supporters!

Our Team

Artists Brendon and Brian Fraim, letterer Marshall Dillon, and producer Michael Solof have reteamed with creator-writer J.C. Vaughn and they’ve been joined by the colorists of House Imagi to launch the Vampire, PA: Bite Out of Crime one-shot.

We've also signed up some premiere cover artists including Billy Tucci (Shi: The Way of the Warrior), European rising star Asha Kishna (Zombie-Sama), and horror legend Neil Vokes (The Wicked West).

  • J.C. Vaughn is best known as the Vice-President of Publishing for Gemstone Publishing, the home of The Overstreet Comic Book Price Guide. In comics he has created or co-created Zombie-Proof with Vincent Spencer, Vampire, PA, The Flight, and Antiques: The Comic Strip with Brendon & Brian Fraim, and Return of the Human with Mark Wheatley, as well as Bedtime Stories for Impressionable Children, McCandless & Company, and others.
  • With fellow Stargate Atlantis and Stargate Universe scribe Mark L. Haynes, he wrote three original graphic novels and a mini-based based on the Fox TV series 24. He also has written or co-written Shi (with Billy Tucci), Mighty Samson (with Jim Shooter), Cory Doctorow’s Futuristic Tales of the Here & Now, Blue Beetle in the DC Universe Holiday Special 2008, and Battlestar Galactica. 

Our Approach to This Project

If you're ready to contribute, we're ready to roll. Can you help us?

  • The creative team has truly worked very hard on this one and it's ready to go without delay.
  • If you choose to support Vampire, PA: Bite Out of Crime, aside from our undying (undead?) appreciation, we'll get you the best comic and the best additional materials we can deliver!
  • This time around, in addition to the comic itself, we have perks ranging from trade paperbacks of the original VPA series and other comic book titles to mini-prints, bookmarks, and even incredible, highly detailed original art from key pages of this issue!

  • Our main financial goal for this Indiegogo is for us to be able to upgrade the cover stock and cover treatments of the comic. If we succeed beyond that and taking care of our expenses, we'd love to have the creative team start working on our next issue!
  •  Just about everyone who has worked on this project is an experienced professional and their jobs are complete. You'll help us get this done and out there to a wider audience than we would reach under our own power.

Risks & Challenges

Shy of an EMP or something else completely unforeseen, we're going to be hard to stop. As mentioned above, the files for the comic are ready to go as soon as we add the text for the Thank-You page.

  • Our production ace is Dawn Guzzo, a veteran of the legendary Marvel Bullpen, and of course letterer Marshall Dillon, known for Lady Death among other projects, makes it all seem easy. In other words, if problems come up, we will still deliver.
  • We successfully crowdfunded and delivered (and upgraded the covers on) the Vampire, PA trade paperback and the Zombie-Proof trade paperback, and JCV was part of the successful campaign for Stargate Atlantis - Volume One.

 

Getting the Word Out

If you can't contribute right now, that definitely does not mean you can't help! 

  • Share our link around, help tell the story and get the word out. If you make some productive, online noise about our campaign, it's going to get more eyeballs on it. More eyeballs equals more chances to find the right folks at the right time!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Tell your friends!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We are a small press publisher located in Pennsylvania in the beautiful Lehigh Valley.

Founded in 2002 as we strive to bring you the best writing and artist teams Independent Comics has to offer. Several titles, and anthologies are to come in the next year and a half. "The Man With No Horse" Our inaugural Book series to be released this April.

Founded in 2002 as we strive to bring you the best writing and artist teams Independent Comics has to offer. Several titles, and anthologies are to come in the next year and a half. "The Man With No Horse" Our inaugural Book series to be released this April.

story:
My Name Is Thomas Alwin Muller, I’m a 43-year-old Cartoonist from the southwestern part of Germany. I’ve been an establish artist for the past 15 years. I’m pleased with my line of work. In fact I believe it is my true calling.

I was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis a few years ago. Art has helped me manage my disease.

I established my Cartoon figure MOPF back in 2000. My aim was to uplift people suffering from chronic disease through what I like to call “cartoon therapy”. My artwork was able to bring smiles to people. Laughter is the best medicine.

MOPF action plan is to support Mentally ill people and become a voice for people in the final stage of their lives. MOPF will raise awareness about chronic diseases such as multiple sclerosis with a series of humoresque and informative cartoons.

I believe MOPF should be known world wide my goal is to reach out to companies as well as people who will be willing to help me establish a Marketing and distribution system. I’ve learned that people will forgetwhat you said, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget how you made them feel. A smile is a great way to start.

If there is no suppurt I am going to establish a publisher company for Mopf and a Smile <3

Mein Name ist Thomas Alwin Müller 43 Jahre aus dem Südwesten Deutschlands. Ich bin ein Künstler mit Herz und Leidenschaft und seit 15 Jahren selbständig.

Da ich eine unheilbare Krankheit für mich überwunden habe weiß ich um die Kraft eines Lächelns. Kunst in mein Beruf, meine Berufung, mein Leben und meine Liebe. Aus meinem Herz ist im Jahr 2000 die Figur MOPF entstanden, die vielen Menschen den Tag und einigen das Leben gerettet hat. Um dieses Potential und die Kraft des Lächelns zu fördern möchte ich meinen Mopf weltweit bekannt machen. Vielleicht wird die Welt ein klein wenig besser. Es fängt bei jedem selbst an.

Ich suche Menschen und Firmen mit deren Hilfe ich ein Marketing- und Vertriebssystem aufbauen kann und die mich auch professionell unterstützen und begleiten. Nur große Ziele sorgen für Veränderung.

Sollte mein Mopf mal richtig erfolgreich sein möchte ich mich gern intensiv für psychisch erkrankte Menschen einsetzen, für die die keine Stimme mehr haben und am Rande des Lebens stehen. Die Wand ist dünn und ein kleines Lächeln kann sicher schon eine große Wirkung haben.

Wenn alle Stricke reissen werde ich für Mopf und das Lächeln einen Verlag gründen.

story:
Story

The 2nd great war is almost over. The allies are closing in the Nazis. A desperate Hitler is rumored to have something up his sleeve. The allies aren't completely sure what it is. They send 3 spies that go by the code name Harpies to figure out what is it. The Harpies stumble upon tip that an occultist name Johanna is Hitler's new weapon. Now, they just have to figure out what it is that Johanna is capable of before its too late. 

Preview

Bios

Marcel Dupree(Writer)- Owns and operates Evoluzione Publishing. He has been writing on and off for the past 7 years. 

 Vincenzo Carratù(artist) Born in Battipaglia in 1990, he attended the school "Comix Ars" of Salerno with excellent results, publishing before the end of the training course a short story on "The Steams Chronicles" for Noise Press. In 2018 the first collaboration began with Venezia Comix on "Capitan Napoli", then with Cut-Up Publishing on Zartana and then landed on American soil with Evoluzione Publishing, realizing the covers of some SFC series and then, first a short story "The Skynwalker "  on" Armor I "and then becoming the artist of the series" Harpies "in collaboration with Spotti Enterteinment, for which he also made a series of covers. 

Vittorio Astone(Colorist) Hi, I'm Vittorio Astone and I'm a professional comic book artist and freelancer concept artist. I've published some short stories with Heavy Metal Magazine and Editoriale Aurea's Lanciostory and now I'm working with Vault Comics on an upcoming comic book series. As a concept artist, I'm currently working as a freelancer for private clients.

As a concept artist, I'm currently working as a freelancer for private clients.

story:
Welcome to the Light Pre-Order Campaign

 

 

The Story 

When our reality came into existence a river of light was set at the center of all things. It is there every soul in the universe returns when they die, that they might be reincarnated, in a new body, on a new world, over and over again until they are made perfect.
 

The guardian of the river of light is Indra,  one of the powerful first Gods. For aeons of time Indra has kept watch over the river. Making sure that both the hero and the villain and everyone in between,  are allowed to return to the waters and be born anew. But when the Ahi, the darkest soul in all of existence returns to the river, Indra finds herself unable to just stand by and watch as it spreads its evil to yet another people, on another world. But in order to intervene she must abandon her duty, and take a stand against both the Gods of Darkness and the Gods of Light, who will not simply allow the great cosmic order to be disrupted. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

LIGHT # 1 is a 40 page full color dark fantasy. Get a copy  before we take a crack at wide distribution early next year. 

PRO TIP: 

The DOUBLE PACKS are designed for you to do a little wheelin' and dealin' of your own. Keep one and throw the second one up on ebay to recoup your cost. Chances are, you will at least break even.   Or for the collectors out there, read one and keep the other pristine in the bag!

We have a couple of great packages for you. Our goal is $2000 and all of the money we earn here will go towards recovering the cost of production and printing. (It turns out its really expensive to make a comic book!) 

A success with this book will allow us to print enough copies to attend conventions with, which will help us make enough money to create more books and pursue our life long dream of making a living in comics. 

We have a bunch of cool projects planned and we hope we will be able to get them into your hands and local comic shops for years to come. 

 

 

RETAIL COVER

 

ZEFIRO BATISTA VARIANT

PAGE 4

PAGE 5

 

PAGE 8

 

PAGE 12

 

THE TEAM

My name is Oldrich Stibor. I've been writing novels and screenplays for over ten years but making comic books has always been my real dream. In fact, if it wasn't for comics, I doubt I would have ever become an avid reader or a written a single word of fiction.

I've scoured the earth for a team of professionals to help me make LIGHT and I'm thrilled to have been able to put together such a talented group of artist for this project and especially to have worked with rising star Val. Jr.,  who did all the outstanding line art for this project. 

Oldrich Stibor               -Writer. 

Val Jr                                - Artist

Mauro Salgado             -Colorist

Rodolfo Valenzuela     -Letterist

 Zefiro Batista -             -Cover artist

 Warnia k Sahadewa   -Cover Colorist

 

Risks & Challenges

The book is already complete and ready to go to the printers. So there is zero chance of LIGHT not being printed. This campaign is just to offset the some of the costs we've invested into production and the printing of the books and to hopefully raise enough money to start the next project. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't back the project, please share it on social media or with anyone you think may be interested. We appreciate the support!
story_txt:
Welcome to the Light Pre-Order Campaign
 


 
The Story 
When our reality came into existence a river of light was set at the center of all things. It is there every soul in the universe returns when they die, that they might be reincarnated, in a new body, on a new world, over and over again until they are made perfect. 
The guardian of the river of light is Indra,  one of the powerful first Gods. For aeons of time Indra has kept watch over the river. Making sure that both the hero and the villain and everyone in between,  are allowed to return to the waters and be born anew. But when the Ahi, the darkest soul in all of existence returns to the river, Indra finds herself unable to just stand by and watch as it spreads its evil to yet another people, on another world. But in order to intervene she must abandon her duty, and take a stand against both the Gods of Darkness and the Gods of Light, who will not simply allow the great cosmic order to be disrupted. 
 
What We Need & What You Get
LIGHT # 1 is a 40 page full color dark fantasy. Get a copy  before we take a crack at wide distribution early next year. 
PRO TIP: 
The DOUBLE PACKS are designed for you to do a little wheelin' and dealin' of your own. Keep one and throw the second one up on ebay to recoup your cost. Chances are, you will at least break even.   Or for the collectors out there, read one and keep the other pristine in the bag!
We have a couple of great packages for you. Our goal is $2000 and all of the money we earn here will go towards recovering the cost of production and printing. (It turns out its really expensive to make a comic book!) 
A success with this book will allow us to print enough copies to attend conventions with, which will help us make enough money to create more books and pursue our life long dream of making a living in comics. 
We have a bunch of cool projects planned and we hope we will be able to get them into your hands and local comic shops for years to come. 
 


 
RETAIL COVER

 
ZEFIRO BATISTA VARIANT

PAGE 4

PAGE 5

 
PAGE 8

 
PAGE 12

 
THE TEAM
My name is Oldrich Stibor. I've been writing novels and screenplays for over ten years but making comic books has always been my real dream. In fact, if it wasn't for comics, I doubt I would have ever become an avid reader or a written a single word of fiction.
I've scoured the earth for a team of professionals to help me make LIGHT and I'm thrilled to have been able to put together such a talented group of artist for this project and especially to have worked with rising star Val. Jr.,  who did all the outstanding line art for this project. 
Oldrich Stibor               -Writer. 
Val Jr                                - Artist
Mauro Salgado             -Colorist
Rodolfo Valenzuela     -Letterist
 Zefiro Batista -             -Cover artist
 Warnia k Sahadewa   -Cover Colorist

 
Risks & Challenges
The book is already complete and ready to go to the printers. So there is zero chance of LIGHT not being printed. This campaign is just to offset the some of the costs we've invested into production and the printing of the books and to hopefully raise enough money to start the next project. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't back the project, please share it on social media or with anyone you think may be interested. We appreciate the support!

story:
Short Summary:

We are ElectroMagnetic Press; an indie publisher that is based in Fairmont, WV and Scotia, NY. The company was formed in 2011 when Larry Morgan and I decided to pursue our dream of making comics together. We released the debut issues of our ongoing series The Believer and The Omens in 2011. A few years later, Mark Fisher came on board as our “handler.” He helps us organize our convention schedule, manage our inventory, and helps compile the Miscellania anthologies.

This campaign is for the second issue of our Miscellania anthology magazine. Miscellania is a true labor of love for us. As we traveled to more and more conventions, we met a number of creators that had never been published anywhere before and it was often because they weren’t confident in their abilities. We wanted to create a space where we could publish their short stories, their comics, their illustrations, their poems, whatever they loved doing. Issue #1 mostly included people who needed the spark that seeing your creation come to life brings, alongside stories that Larry and I had been wanting to publish.

Miscellania #2 takes everything up a notch. This time around, we have a fantastic color cover, a new layout designer, and over 100 pages of material! The cover story, Witches & Poppits, was written by New York Times Best Selling author Melanie Karsak, who wrote The Airship Racing Chronicles and The Harvesting series. It also includes an ode to independent creators by J.R. Mounts, the creator of Fried Pickle Noir. Miscellania #2 also contains the second parts of my comic, Lady, and Larry’s comic, Fairmont Five Vs. The Mothman! All in all there are over 25 contributors this time around!

Contributing to this campaign ensures that these stories get published. Not only are you helping further our dream of publishing more ElectroMagnetic Press material, but you are helping dozens of independent authors and illustrators bring their dreams to life. We hope you will consider helping us to nurture and inspire the confidence of these talented storytellers and artists while helping provide them with a space to be heard. We aren’t Corporate America- no one had to pay to be in our anthology. They are in it because we believe in their talent and we hope that you will too.

What We Need & What You Get:

Our needs our simple, we are trying to raise $1,000 to pay for the printing of Miscellania #2. We are trying our best not to over-complicate things as this is our first ever crowdfunding campaign. Our hope is that we can raise enough money to cover the printing costs. If we should go over our goal, then all extra money will be put towards advertising Miscellania #2 and convention table fees so we can continue to get out there and introduce it to people.

We are offering a few great perks for this campaign!  You can get Miscellania #1 and #2 as a bundle, just pick up Miscellania #2, or even get “The Kitchen Sink,” which includes Miscellania #’s 1 and 2 as well as our ElectroMagnetic Press comics, The Believer (issues 1 and 2) and The Omens (issues 1-3)!

If we do not reach our goal, all funds collected will be put directly towards the cost of printing the anthology. No funds will go anywhere else!

The Impact:

Bringing Miscellania #2 to life is important to us at ElectroMagnetic Press! As the world gets more and more digital, less and less authors and illustrators get to hold their creations in their hands in physical form. We believe this is extremely important. Knowing that you created something that you can hold in your hands and show to other people is an accomplishment. It makes it all feel real and we want all of these authors and illustrators to feel that.

Other Ways to Help:

We appreciate everyone that is even considering helping us make Miscellania #2 a reality. If you can’t help us fund this campaign, we totally get it. We can’t always help funds campaigns we are interested in either. If you’d like to help, please tell your friends and family about the Miscellania #2 campaign! You can do this by using the IndieGoGo share tool or by sharing on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram or by getting old school and telling your buddies about our campaign at the next poker night or girls night out! We appreciate anything you can do.

story:
The Story Behind Our Campaign
 

Welcome to our third P. Craig Russell original art restoration campaign! We have previously run successful campaigns to restore and preserve the original art for Ariane and Bluebeard and The Dreaming City. We hope that our previous backers will continue to support this ongoing restoration of Craig's beautiful work and that we will also reach new supporters with this campaign.

"While the Gods Laugh" is a graphic adaptation of the Elric story and it was created by Roy Thomas and P. Craig Russell. It originally appeared in Epic Illustrated #14, released by Marvel on October 1, 1982.

 

P. Craig Russell hand-colored his original art. These original art pages are not lettered (the lettering was done on separate sheets of paper) so they are clutter-free and glorious to look at. The pages have been kept in a climate-controlled environment at the Billy Ireland Cartoon Library & Museum in Columbus, Ohio and they are in great shape. The colors are beautifully vivid—even more so than in previously printed versions.

 

 

Comparison of the first printed version with the same panel from the original art. The restored version will be much truer to the original.
 

 

We are attempting to restore this great work by making high-resolution scans of the original unlettered, hand-colored art. For posterity's sake, we also need to scan each and every corresponding page of lettering so that it can be combined with the color art for any future presentations of this material.

A few of the pages were not stored at the Cartoon Library and Museum and the colors have faded and shifted considerable. These pages will have to be gone over by P. Craig Russell and recolored by hand so that they are closer to their original beauty.On top of the scanning and restoration, we also have to cover the cost of multiple all-day road trips down to Columbus, Ohio to retrieve and return the original art elements. These, along with many other expenses, ultimately add up to an unfortunately sizable amount.

This campaign will allow us to cover all of the costs of this expensive restoration and will also enable us to provide our valued pledge partners with a number of unique perks to thank them for making it all possible.

 

Finally, a successful campaign will enable us to provide the restored files to Titan Comics for use in an upcoming new hardcover edition . . . so this amazing masterwork of comic art can be enjoyed by a whole new generation!

story:
Who I Am:

I'm Catie (CE) Murphy, author of many many many books, quite a few short stories, and the occasional graphic novel!

I've loved comics since I was a kid, and keep noodling with scripts but rarely have the money to pay an artist, because...well, I'm an author, that's why. Despite JK Rowling and Stephen King, authors are not actually notorious for making very much money, so this project is to help defray the costs of paying an artist for this little project I want to launch.

What It Is:

Starshot is a little bit Farscape, a little bit Guardians of the Galaxy, and a little bit "Yeah, but what if the girls were the main characters?" It's a little bit of frustration that so many comics these days aren't aimed at kids. It's a little bit of wanting to write some epic swashbuckling space opera adventure. It's a little bit of all of that, and a lot of love for the science fiction genre and the comic book format.

It's also a little bit of "Dang it, I've had this script sitting around for years and I'm gonna DO SOMETHING with it!", and now, having found a collaborator who's excited about drawing it, I'm just really looking forward to putting it together and getting it out into the world. This short is very much a chapter one style thing, so this project might--who knows--spawn more, someday!

What I Need:

I need $2000 USD (about €1800) to pay the fabulous Katie Longua for 8 fully drawn, colored and lettered digital comic book pages. GOAL REACHED!!!

Stretch Goal #1: I'd LOVE an additional $400/€365 to pay MYSELF for having written the script. Wouldn't that be neat? :) GOAL REACHED!!!!! OMG!!! I'VE NEVER GOTTEN PAID FOR A COMIC BEFORE!!!

Stretch Goal #2: The basic plan here is to do a digital-only release for Starshot. To do a small physical print run, it'll be an additional $750/€680, which will cover both the print costs and shipping assuming up to 300 people want a print comic shipped to them. :)

Total goal, including stretch goals: $3150/€2845

HOLY MOLY WE REACHED BOTH THE STRETCH GOALS!!!!

ADDITIONAL STRETCH GOALS AS FOLLOWS:

At €3200, there will be COVER ART and COVER ART PRINTS for everyone getting print copies of Starshot!

At €4200, there will be FOUR ADDITIONAL PAGES of story! This is an all or nothing: print means adding 4 pages at a time, so if we only get to €3800, the writer (that's me) will get a more generous page rate, and any excess will be tucked aside to cover unexpected expenses.

In the event of reaching €5200, we'll get a total of EIGHT PAGES of additional story! CAN YOU EVEN IMAGINE?!?!?! EEEEEEEEEK!!!!

When It'll Be Ready:

Artist Katie Longua has the month of November available for a project just like this one! We're looking at a March 2020 delivery date for print product, and presumably earlier than that for digital downloads!

What Could Go Wrong:

I mean. *gestures at the world* Look, at least they decided not to pull the USPS out of the global mailing system. But mostly, the script is written, the artist has the time, I've got a line on where to get print copies made if we get that far, so honestly, I'm pretty sure we can get this baby out the door in record time!

story:
I'm starting this indiegogo campaign to help fund my trip to New York this August. I will be there for one week, August 24th through August 31st. While it is mainly a vacation to see friends and explore new venues to pursue my comedy career, there will be plenty of debaucherous activity. While many people might try to con other people into giving them money, I'm not conning anyone. I'm coming up just a bit short on where I want to be financially for the trip. So with that said if you watch my comedy and you enjoy it and consider yourself a Dirty Dan fan and would like to help me out by all means let's do this. Again I'm not begging for money I'm just asking my fans and people would like to take part in funding my awesome vacation in comedic
exploration and creativity to do so and I would greatly appreciate anything that you donate. Just know this, when I am rich and famous I will buy you a unicorn and a hand job. Thanks for your time, if it ain't dirty, it ain't worthy. #teamdirty
